Description: We share this experience; the buds of connection interweave us across lineages. Under darkness, let the nectar of her medicine stir and awaken. Poetry and movement artist Necorita brings her presentation of Datura Intacta to London, in collaboration with Iamasoftwoman and Moon&Soma, for a second rendition this spring. Together, they will weave a sequence of ritualistic performances that will drift you gently into an altered state, like the enchanting yet deadly drops of the devil's trumpet. This will be an eclectic gathering of art and poetry; of ritual and medicine; of beauty and stillness; of movement and sound. A celebration of cultures, our ancestral roots, and reverence towards the lands and plants that carry magic and meaning. The event will also feature pop-up stalls from: LAMANO (Mexican design, cacao, mezcal) Iamsoftsea (Sea moss skin toner from the Caribbean islands) Akari Astrology (Astrocartography and tarot readings) We will end the night with music and good vibes. Come and join us for an evening of inspiration, connection and  relaxation.
Title: Datura Intacta: An Evening of Ritual & Relaxation
Subtitle: Join us for an inspiring and relaxing evening of poetry, performance, market stalls, music and a bit of magic.

Description: The exceptional musicians of the Piccadilly Sinfonietta and renowned pianist Warren Mailley-Smith perform a selection of Bach's magnificent piano concertos by candlelight in the beautiful setting of St Mary Le Strand, London. A hugely appealing programme designed to help you celebrate the weekend in style! There are many restaurants and bars nearby to complete your night out.Note - there are two performances available: 6pm and 8pmFeaturingThe Piccadilly SinfoniettaWarren Mailley-Smith - PianoProgrammeBach - Piano Concerto No.2 in E majBach - Piano Concerto No.5 in F minBach - Piano Concerto No.6 in G minorSince its formation in 2017, the Piccadilly Sinfonietta have become a regular feature on the UK concert scene, giving up to 100 performances a year in some of the country‚Äôs most beautiful and prestigious venues. The ensemble comprises some of the most prodigious musical talent and performs exclusively with leading virtuoso soloists. The group performs under the artistic direction of its founder, concert pianist Warren Mailley-Smith and focuses on the virtuoso concerto repertoire of the baroque, classical and early romantic periods.In 2016 Warren Mailley-Smith became the first British pianist to perform Chopin's complete works for solo piano from memory in a series of 11 recitals at St John's Smith Square. Hailed by the critics as an "epic achievement", Mailley-Smith will repeat the series at several venues in 2022.He has given acclaimed solo recitals at The Wigmore Hall, Carnegie Hall and has performed for the British Royal Family on numerous occasions. One of the busiest concert pianists of his generation and gave over 100 solo performances in 2021.Here's a short video of the Piccadilly Sinfonietta performing with Warren Mailley-Smith:https://youtu.be/5RUlxbk27
Title: Bach Piano Concertos by Candlelight
Subtitle: Enjoy an outstanding evening of classical music in the beautiful setting of St Mary Le Strand.

Description: At this Single Muslims Speed Dating event you can expect to meet around 16-18 people in 4 minute dates with an interval half way through for refreshments. Single Muslims Speed Dating kicks off at 7:30pm prompt and any guests arriving late may not be able to take part so please ensure you arrive 10 minutes before the scheduled start time to allow for registration. When all the guests have arrived the host will explain how the evening will unfold and you will be provided with a scorecard, name badge and pen. When the event begins women will be seated and men will rotate between tables every 4 minutes. At the end of each date guests mark on their scorecard whether they would like to see that person again. There will be a 10 minute break half way through to allow for refreshments. The event will finish around 21:00pm but guests are welcome to stay and mingle if they wish. Before you leave the host will collect all the scorecards in and collate the matches and the following day you will receive an e-mail with the results. We know everyone is sick of dating apps and meeting online so we want to give Single Muslims the chance to meet other muslim singletons in a relaxed and safe environment. We know what makes a great speed dating and we‚Äôve designed our events to help people make the most of the night and meet someone special. Live, in-person, real events with real people are the best way to meet a lot of people all looking for that special someone, in a short amount of time while having a really fun night in the process. Due to the popularity of this event, we advise you to book your ticket in advance and at your earliest to avoid disappointment. To ensure gender ratio, bookings are non-refundable. Note: we are not responsible for people's schedules - no shows or latecomers! We have hired the private basement 7:30pm - Speed dating starts 21:00pm - Speed dating ends 11-00pm-Venue closes Nearest Station-Stratford International Attendees must arrive 10 minutes before the event start time to find parking. Latecomers will be refused entry or charged a ¬£25 late fee. No exceptions, ensure that you arrive on time. Refunds are not given for any reason. Tickets cannot be transferred to future events or to another person once issued. Tickets are non-transferable and cannot be given or sold to another person. Attendees are expected to behave respectfully and politely towards other attendees and event staff. Any inappropriate language, bad behaviour, or verbal or physical abuse will not be tolerated and will result in immediate ejection from the event. In serious cases, the police may be notified. If the event is postponed for any reason, attendees will be notified 48 hours before the event start date via email. There are no refunds issued if the event is postponed, all attendees will be notified with the new date. Refunds for postponements are only issued for exceptional circumstances. If the event is canceled for any reason, attendees will receive a full refund, which will be our only liability to you. We cannot guarantee that events will have equal numbers of men and women or be at full capacity. We will make every effort to accommodate uneven numbers, which may include more of one group and fewer of another, in order to provide the best experience possible for all attendees. PLEASE NOTE THIS EVENT WILL TAKE PLACE ON THE FIRST FLOOR. PLEASE  TAKE THE LIFT OR STAIRS WHEN YOU ARRIVE AT THE VENUE
Title: Single Muslim Professionals Speed Dating (Ages 25-38)
Subtitle: Speed dating events allow you to meet 14-18 people in your age range for 4 minute mini dates.This allows you to get to know each person.

Description: London's Finest Floating Comedy Club!  Join us at beautiful Paddle Steamer The Tattershall Castle for Laughs while floating on the Thames! Each show is packed with the TV faces, the best of the UK comedy Circuit and rising stars, all brought to you by our team with 21 years experience of making unforgettable nights out. Shows are followed by the POPworld nightclub, included in your ticket, so you can party until 2am! Line ups available at www.boatshowcomedy.co.uk 'Guaranteed to book the best' The Sunday Times 'Glitzier than your average night of stand-up' The Evening Standard 'You feel like you've gatecrashed an exclusive party'? What's On 'Always has the feeling of a special occasion, one of London's finest venues' Chortle Please contact us if you have any access requirements on Jack@bluebookam.com or 07932 658895 * Age restriction for our shows is 18 years and over, due to venue licencing restrictions. ID may be required for entry. * Dress code ‚Äì No tracksuit bottoms, football or other sport shirts or soiled work clothes. Entry may be refused. We do not allow fancy dress (including sashes and hats) during the comedy * All seating is pre-allocated, and you will be shown to your seats on arrival. Please let us know if you'll be arriving late  * For the enjoyment of all our customers, we politely remind patrons that if you persistently chat during acts or are otherwise causing a disturbance, you may be asked to leave. * For groups of 8 or more we ask for a behaviour bond of ¬£5 per person to be given in cash at the start of the night when you enter the room. You can collect this at the end of the night. We will only retain this if one or more of your party are asked to leave for heckling, persistently talking during the acts or disturbing the show. * For any further info, or for specific requests relating to your party, please call us on 07932 658895 *Line ups are subject to change

Description: The London Zen Centre invites you to an intensive day of practice, led by  Dharma Master Bogumi≈Ça Malinowska. This one day retreat will include walking and sitting meditation, as well as chanting and a Kong-an/koan interview with the guiding teacher at the London Zen centre (a private one on one session for questions and discussion). We will also have a formal meal together, and Dharma Master Bogumi≈Ça Malinowska will be present for any guidance or to answer any questions. Important: If you are interested in this retreat but have never practiced before, then  please get in touch via the above e-mail address as soon as possible as we will need to give you a brief introduction to our practice before the retreat commences.  Sitting a retreat (even just for one day) is a great way to expand our awareness, get in touch with our true self and perhaps even clarify our life's direction. By doing the same simple practices in repetion you see your mind appear. If you have any questions regarding the retreat or zen practice in general then reach out to: v.zen.kwanum@gmail.com If you can't make this event, but would like to be informed of future events then sign up to our newsletter here:  https://125b0e86.sibforms.com/serve/MUIEAGutoYw1qCshnzp8P6psei7pJx7okqFZ_5tAtK_npG-FSL1NeD8Hi901hA7aYhebBFMEVAqVWeWFQAcjWrwa1qPVxw1v33Pe5bm6CPsUbpgSxEP5cWxSgUobkC4zuWsO7wspBSE21GDLxSXuaEB43HD6ZINlGE8jLZWnuiGcGWr_nk4PeiDX-9CDlbIRDBuUpOApgn8lCObE The practice of meditation in the Kwan Um School of Zen is a practice of the very essence of pure mind - a training of concentration, peace, wisdom and compassion - beyond religious disputes and divisions. LINE AUTHORIZATION: Zen Master Seung Sahn, 78th Patriarch of Korean Buddhism

Description: As the days gradually lengthen and a sense of renewal is in the air, join Suzanne for a transformative 2-hour workshop that beckons you to carve out a sanctuary of self-care.  We invite you to dedicate two hours to yourself, a blissful retreat from the demands of daily life. Find solace in a space where time slows down, allowing you to unwind and discover the art of relaxation. In this workshop, we'll begin with a soothing yin yoga practice, allowing you to delve into stillness by holding poses for extended periods. This gentle exploration invites you to connect with your body's sensations, observing the transformative effects of slowing down on both your physical and mental well-being.Following the yin practice, we will then transition to an immersive yoga nidra practice, where you will be led through a guided meditation with no effort required, as you are taken on a journey to a place of deep relaxation, a place somewhere between wakefulness and dreaming.This workshop is your opportunity to carve out time exclusively for yourself, to relax, unwind, and let go. Join us for an experience that transcends the ordinary, allowing you to cultivate a deeper connection with your inner self. Embrace March as a month of renewal and self-care ‚Äì your sanctuary awaits.You can bring your mat or rent one for ¬£2 from Oru.
Title: A Moment of Calm
Subtitle: Join Suzanne for a transformative Yin Yoga and Yoga Nidra to find a moment of calm amongst the busyness of life

Description: Aho Community is honoured to invite you to a collaboration with Rakesh ‚ÄúRootsman Rak‚Äù. Join us in community over two weekends at Berkeley Farm in Hainault to connect to the land and bring you the knowledge and hands on experience to design and create a forest garden. ¬† Rakesh ‚ÄúRootsman Rak‚Äù is an experienced permaculture and forest gardening designer and teacher. He will coordinate all participants to help make a real forest garden design for Berkeley Farm. You will learn his design tools, learning the many tools Rakesh has in his permaculture and forest gardening toolbox. ¬† We are all too well aware of the challenges the world faces, especially in our food growing systems. This course shows us how to address many of these issues by making low maintenance, nutrient dense, biodiverse rich food growing systems know as food forests or forest gardening. We will also add many additional features to the design using Permaculture design. ¬† So if you are interested in ecology; helping to increase biodiversity; sequester carbon; manage greenhouse gases; cool your surroundings while growing nutrient dense foods, soaps, medicines, crafting materials, etc but with minimum effort i.e. where nature does the work, and enriches itself, then this course is for you. ¬† First Weekend: Designing forest gardens9th-10th March 2024, 9am-5pm ¬† Imagine your garden or community space looking as lovely as a woodland edge. Imagine that on top of looking wonderfully wild, it produces an abundance of nutrient dense food and will ultimately need very little digging, weeding, manual watering or pest control - all in harmony with animals and other beings (eco friendly and vegan). This is ‚Äòan edible forest garden‚Äô. ¬† Forest gardening is a way of growing food where nature does most of the work for you. Modelled on natural woodland, crops are grown in different layers from high and medium sized canopy to roots, ground cover and climbers. And its not just food and medicine you will get from the forest garden, there are many more yields. ¬† Through careful planning plants are chosen which have beneficial effects on each other, attract beneficial insects and create a healthy biodiverse rich system that maintains its own fertility. Once established, your main task will be harvesting! The course is designed so you will learn how to make a forest garden anywhere, including your own home, while also making a real design for Berkeley Farm. ¬† Over the 2 days you will learn about the basics of designing a forest garden. You will get to understand- How to select the right plants for your environment- Where to place them to ensure they thrive- How to ensure you have the right nutrients cycling to ensure good crops- History of forest gardening- Why make a food forest- Layout of a forest garden- Multifunctional pathways- Creating abundance and resilience- Low maintenance food growing- Patterns in nature for forest gardens- Understanding and maximising edge You will put all of this into action by helping to design a real forest garden for the farm. Second Weekend: Permaculture Design16th-17th March 2024 9am-5pm ¬† Over the 2 days you will learn about the basics of permaculture design. You will get to understand- Permaculture ethics and how to use them to make ethical choices- Permaculture principles and how to use them to strengthen designs- A design methodology to simplify and make designs easier and more robust- Water management strategies- Soil improvement strategies- Land management strategies- Low maintenance food growing systems ¬† You will put all of this into action by helping to design a real forest garden for Berkeley Farm. ¬† The course will be led by Rakesh ‚ÄúRootsman Rak‚Äù - experienced Permaculture designer, teacher and Forest Garden specialist, yoga teacher and homeopath. He has been growing food since he was a child, and has been designing and teaching edible landscaping, permaculture, forest gardening, etc since 2009. Rakesh has designed and implemented forest gardens from small-scale private gardens and schools, to farms, community gardens, communal nature gardens, as well as helping design and implement forest gardens for various eco villages. ¬† Location: Berkeley FarmManor Rd, Lambourne End,Romford, RM4 1NH,United Kingdom ¬† Boots and appropriate clothing requested, bring your own lunch. Hot soup, teas, tools, shelter and a sacred fire provided. A notepad is recommended. ¬† We want this course to be accessible and feel a reasonable price of ¬£220 for the¬†two weekend¬†course towards meeting the needs of the facilitator(s) is acceptable ¬† But if you are on low income and wish to attend please contact darenellis@aho.community to discuss a concession price or if you can only attend 1¬†of the weeknds this is possible at a cost of ¬£120. ¬† If you jave any questions or would like to contact RakeshFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/rootsmanrakEmail: rakeshaji@gmail.com
Title: Forest Garden & Permaculture Design Course
Subtitle: Join us in community at Berkeley Farm to connect to the land and bring you the knowledge and experience to design and create a forest garden

Description: Welcome to the Family Friendly Drum Circle in Uxbridge! Join us at the Quaker Meeting House on York Road for a rhythmic and fun-filled event. Bring your whole family along for an exciting experience of drumming and music. This in person gathering promises to be a fantastic opportunity to connect with others in the community through the universal language of music. Come and enjoy the beats, make new friends, and create lasting memories. We can't wait to drum with you! No experience necessary. It matters not if you see yourself as a complete novice, a seasonal drummer or musician. All that we encourage is that you come with an open mind and heart and have the intentions to "Enjoy the moment". We use drums, all sets of percussions, body sounds and maybejust maybe a little bit of your voice. By which at that time, you would behaving too much fun, you wouldn't care that you were anyways. Come as you are! For more info on your facilitator, click here.

Description: Join us for a fast, fun, and flirty evening of speed dating for ages 30-45 (age guide) at the stylish El Vino Wine Bar near London Bridge. You can expect to meet around 20 people at this popular event in town, and the crowd is always well-dressed and ready to let their hair down. The event starts promptly at 7 pm, and we advise arriving 15-30 minutes before the scheduled start time to allow for registration. On arrival, one of our friendly hosts will be waiting to register you. When everyone has arrived, the host will explain how the evening will unfold and provide you with a scorecard, name badge, and pen. Women will be seated, and men will rotate between tables every 4-5 minutes. At the end of each date, guests can mark their scorecard or mobile phone whether they would like to see that person again. There will be a 15-minute break halfway through the event to allow for refreshments, and the event will finish around 9:30 pm. Guests are welcome to stay afterwards and socialize. If you've used your mobile phone to enter your preferences, you'll be able to view your matches instantly at the end of the event. Otherwise, please take home your scorecard and upload your matches before 12 pm the following day. Please be aware that tickets for our events are limited, and the majority get booked up in advance, so we advise booking early to avoid disappointment. If you have any queries about this event, please contact us at enquiries@dateinadash.com or call our telephone bookings hotline on 0845 862 1448 (9 am-5 pm).
Title: BIG Saturday Night Speed Dating in London (Ages 30-45)
Subtitle: DateinaDash present London's busiest Speed Dating event on Saturday night for ages 30-45. Meet 15-20 people in fun 4 minute dates.

Description: Here you can book a pottery evening, for yourself or a group! These are BYOB pottery evenings where I will show you some different hand-building techniques, and you will have free reign to make whatever ceramic pieces your heart desires! You‚Äôre welcome to bring whatever drinks you‚Äôd like, I will supply the cups :-) DETAILS ABOUT THE POTTERY EVENINGS: The groups are held in the Winchmore Hill studio every Saturday, from 6-8pm, with up to 8 people per group. Adults only! There will be alcohol present so no children please! Please note these are hand-building sessions, so won‚Äôt involve using a pottery wheel. We will be going through how to make a pinch pot, how to attach handles and how to decorate your pots with engraved drawings and carved patterns. Each attendee will have one pot glazed and be able to choose from a range of colours (with the option go glaze more pots at an additional cost). Pots will be bisque fired, glazed, fired again, and ready to collect around 2-3 weeks after the pottery evening. I will send out an email when they are ready to pick up, so you can come and bring them home! EACH 2 HOUR SESSION COSTS ¬£40 PER PERSON (EXCLUDING EVENTBRITE BOOKING FEES), WHICH COVERS: 1 800g ball of terracotta clay All pieces fired All pieces glazed in 1 solid colour (not including pieces made with additionally bought clay) Guidance with hand-building techniques ADDITIONAL COSTS : multiple glaze colours - ¬£6 glaze pattern / design / detailed colours - ¬£12 extra 800g ball of clay - ¬£4 each additional pot to be glazed - ¬£4 DISCLAIMERS : Refunds will only be accepted a minimum of 7 days before the event, as I‚Äôm dependent on the income from these evenings, and am unable to find people to fill in for last-minute cancellations. I know things can‚Äôt always be predicted, so if you should be unable to attend within 7 days of the event, please let me know and I can supply an at-home pottery kit, where you will be able to make a pot at home, and bring it into the shop to be fired and glazed. Thank-you for understanding ! Firing and glazing can be very unpredictable, and there is no guarantee that your pots will survive two rounds in the kiln. While some breakages are minor and can be easily fixed, there is always the chance that with any air trapped inside, your pots could explode or break apart when fired. Luckily this has only happened to me a couple times before! But if it should happen to your pot, you are welcome to come to the shop + pick up another ball of clay for ¬£4, which you can use to make another piece at home, and bring in to be fired. (I will also do my best to keep the broken pieces together, so they can be superglued back into one piece!)
Title: BYOB Hand-Building Pottery Evenings !
Subtitle: BYOB Hand-Building Pottery Evenings !   Play with some clay + make your own pot !

Description: Tribalheart Ecstatic dance creates space for free-form movement in a chat free zone where you can dive deeply into the heart, reconnecting, expressing, dancing in and out, up and down, learning to let go of anything and everything that holds you back from yourSelf and inner freedom. Let the energy move you, let the spirit of the heart guide you. There is space to dance alone and no pressure to connect with anyone else, just be yourself and honour what you need in the moment. This night is an inspiration and fusion of club culture, dancing yoga, active meditation, cardio fitness, Ecstatic trance dance (blindfolds available) and a sacred Nataraj. If you choose to connect, it is a chance to meet others without words from a place of movement, meditation, energy and soul; eyes and heart wide open. The evening We will start the evening with a welcoming warmup to relax the body and mind. Together we will set an intention for the evening inviting the heart to open and awaken within us thus creating sacred space for all. For those that wish to partake, we will enjoy and deepen our intention with a short Cacao ceremony. (The cacao is used to take us deeper into our body, awakening our senses, connecting us to heart energy and aiding a spring in our step) We also embark on some dynamic breathwork to fire us up for the evening. - Please leave at least 2 hours after eating a heavy meal if drinking cacao. -Please do not drink alcohol before the event as it is contraindicated with some of the breathwork techniques we practice We inject passion into sourcing the music for our events and aim to deliver an eclectic mix of genres for your heart. From tribal to electronic and everything in between we aim to assist a natural flow peaking and resting to mirror the rhythm and energy of life. Prepare to shake, spin, whirl and twirl. The music becomes the facilitator during the wild ecstatic dance ending with moments of stillness into silence where we can rest and breathe together. 2/3/2024-Dj Jan Michael @ Somers Town community sports centre 9/3/2024-Dj Tara@ Upper room 16/3/24-Dj FX10K@Upper room 23/3/2024-Dj Atmo@Upper room Admission UPPER ROOM-Doors open from 730pm and we start at 8pm. No entry after 8pm without prior arrangement (as we may not hear the door bell) Evening-730pm-11pm. A ddress-8 Greenland Street, Camden NW1 0ND Cost is on a sliding scale. Tickets- ¬£25-Abundant Friend ¬£20-Working Friend ¬£15-No wage/student (Limited tickets) N O REFUNDS Book tickets via paypal- https://paypal.me/moveandmeditate?locale.x=en_GB or eventbrite- https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/.../return-to-source... Optional teas and social after the dance Tara on 07776321878 Tara has been facilitating dance, movement and meditation groups under Tribalheart since 2007. She is a lover of all types of dance, meditation, massage, breathwork and many other nourishing things. Tara qualified in Mental health nursing in 1998 and worked as a specialist addictions nurse for over 17 years. She trained and developed in various methods over the years from bodywork, tantra, shamanism, hypnotherapy, psychosexual somatics and breathwork which she blends into her various groups and 1:1 practise. If you are interested in a 1:1 session with Tara please email tara@tribalheart.co.uk , info@divinebodybliss.co.uk
Title: Tribalheart Ecstatic Dance, breathwork and Cacao @The Upper Room
Subtitle: Move your body- Free your mind-Dancing @The Upper Room

Description: QiGong Energy Therapy For thousands of years Traditional Chinese Medicine has utilised QiGong Energy therapy along with Acupuncture and Herbal Medicine to balance the flow of Qi/Vital Energy throughout the JingLuo (Energy Meridians) & the ZangFu (Zang refers to the Energy of the Yin organs: Heart, Liver, Spleen, Lungs and Kidneys - Fu refers to the Energy of the Yang organs - Small Intestine, Large Intestine, Gall Bladder, Urinary Bladder, Stomach and SanJiao). QiGong Energy therapy techniques include: Restoring balance and harmony in the body's Qi Energy field assists the natural healing process of the human body to take place which is the holistic context of Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM). This harmonisation achieves a coherence between the Physical, Emotional, Mental and Spiritual aspects allowing for unity of the 3 Treasures of TCM. Shi XingFa is highly experienced and has been providing Traditional Chinese Medicine - specialising in QiGong Energy therapy - in London, throughout the UK, Europe & on International Retreats Worldwide for over 10 years. Shi XingFa offers QiGong Energy therapy sessions combined with bespoke QiGong Energy training schedules. QiGong Energy therapy can support and be beneficial for: QI GONG Energy therapy can be used in conjunction with Conventional Western Medicine to complement the body's natural healing processes. The initial session will explore your medical history and full range of symptoms prior to QI GONG Energy therapy. Initial sessions are 75 minutes which includes a full consultation (¬£90 - 75 minute session) - Website booking option Follow up treatments will then be advised dependent on each individual case. Description: Awaken your mind and body to a new level and learn how to practice meditation in motion. The purpose of this yoga lineage is to guide you toward cultivating a conscious connection, integration and awakening of the body, mind, heart and spirit. You will learn and practice Patanjali's 8 limbs of yoga: Work primarily with the Amrit posture sequence, gentle vinyasa flows and extended posture holding times. Explore the deepest levels of body, mind and spirit with the integrative practices of clear intention, breath, meditative awareness and conscious integration. Learn to balance your nervous system with the ‚Äúfirst half‚Äù and ‚Äúsecond half‚Äù of a posture. To transition from an active state of ‚Äúdoing‚Äù a posture, to a relaxed state of ‚Äúbeing‚Äù. And to feel the effects of a posture. Learn to consciously encounter your "edge" of body and mind to release deep tensions and restore the natural flow of the vital life force energy (prana). Good for all levels, from those with some experience to more experienced practitioners. Some experience with yoga and postures is recommended. BIOGRAPHY I have been guiding spiritual seekers for over 30 years with the self-transformative teachings of yoga, meditation, Ayurveda and breathing. It is my pleasure and honor to guide you toward self-empowerment, transformation and awakened consciousness. I will help you connect to your deepest self and inner guide, from the physical to the soul dimension. SOULDIMENSION.ORG Copyright ¬© 2022 ‚Ä¢ Soul Dimension
Title: Awakening Yoga ‚Ä¢ Weekly Class ‚Ä¢ City of Westminster
Subtitle: Weekly online class with a spiritual focus to awaken one‚Äôs consciousness and highest potential.

Description: Every Saturday, Coyote Ugly in Piccadilly transforms into more than just a bar‚Äîit becomes a legendary experience, ensuring an unforgettable night to remember. Stepping into this iconic venue is like entering a realm where the spirit of New York‚Äôs Coyote Ugly Saloon collides with the vibrant energy of London. Since 1993, Coyote Ugly has been the epitome of lively entertainment and a fusion of American-style diner delights. As you find your spot, the air is electrified with anticipation. The playlist takes you on a musical journey, featuring everything from classic rock anthems by KISS and AC/DC to the chart-topping hits of Beyonc√© and Ariana Grande. With a mix that spans decades and genres, the music creates the perfect backdrop for an evening of non-stop fun. Feeling hungry? Indulge in mouthwatering American-style diner food that is sure to satisfy your cravings. And when it comes to drinks, Coyote Ugly delivers without fail. Refreshing beverages flow generously, ensuring that your glass is always filled. But the true highlight of the night? The ‚ÄúCoyote For The Night‚Äù packages. Have you ever dreamt of taking center stage on the bar, mastering the art of Coyote Ugly‚Äôs signature moves? Now is your opportunity. Learn a routine with one of the famous Coyotes and showcase your skills on the bar for a night that revolves around you. Whether you‚Äôre commemorating a special occasion or just seeking a wild Saturday night out, Coyote Ugly in Piccadilly is the ultimate destination. Join the crowd, let go of inhibitions, and immerse yourself in a world where the music never ceases, the drinks keep pouring, and every moment turns into a celebration. Coyote Ugly: where the party is eternal, and memories are crafted. Here‚Äôs to a year filled with unforgettable Saturday moments at Coyote Ugly! Did you know ClubTicket.co.uk is your one stop shop for all tickets? Check out all our nightlife events and tickets! Is it your birthday? Use our form by using the following link https://clubticket.co.uk/birthday to make your night a night to remember. Also, the birthday person gets FREE Entry! Social Secs, Union officials, Sports Team Captains or Big Groups? Let us know who you are, and we‚Äôll give you and your group VIP treatment! Email us at vip@clubticket.co.uk Important: This event is 18+ (ID will be required). Entry must be no later than the time on your ticket. Single Entry is not allowed. Customers may be subject to a search on arrival. Our dress code is smart/casual strictly no sportswear or trainers. Management reserve the right to refuse entry in accordance with licensing law. In the event of this event not taking place due to restrictions of Covid-19, an alternative date will be provided. For full Terms and Conditions please visit clubticket.co.uk/terms-conditions
Title: Coyote Ugly Piccadilly Every Saturday
Subtitle: Every Saturday, Coyote Ugly in Piccadilly transforms into more than just a bar‚Äîit becomes a legendary experience.

Description: Darling, are you searching for a drag brunch like no other? Are you craving an afternoon of glittering, Prosecco-fuelled, unadulterated drag fabulousness? Well, look no further than Ginger‚Äôs Big Drag Brunch‚Äì the most camp and outrageous event to grace London‚Äôs bottomless brunch scene. Hosted by BFF to the stars Ms Ginger Phlappage, and her squad of sassy and hilarious brunch queens and kings, Ginger‚Äôs Big Drag Brunch brings you a boozy afternoon of drag performances, games, challenges, quizzes and plenty of audience participation, honey. Come prepared for free-flowing Prosecco and a scrummy two course brunch menu, with live DJs playing your favourite dance classics, feel-good tunes and cheesy pop hits. Perfect for birthdays, hen and stag parties, celebrations or just a mad afternoon with the gals! With a whole host of fabulous drag queens from across London and beyond performing their most gag-worthy lip-sync numbers, dance extravaganzas and side-splitting comedy skits, guests at Ginger‚Äôs Big Drag Brunch will be in for quite the show! Find us at Balls Brothers, Austin Friars‚Äì just a 5 minute walk from Liverpool Street Station! MAINS Cheeseburger on a toasted bun with French fries (Burger garnish - lettuce, tomato and sliced pickle) Avocado on toast with poached eggs (V) Falafel & spinach burger with vegan lime yoghurt on a toasted bun with French fries (Burger garnish - lettuce, tomato and sliced pickle) - (V) (VG) (GF option available on request) BRUNCH DESSERT Vanilla Cheesecake with raspberry coulis (V) Chocolate Pot with raspberry coulis (VG) (GF) (DF) We are happy to offer options for any dietary requirements. Please email info@partywithginger.com at least 5 days in advance of your booking. 2 course meal and Bottomless Prosecco (bottomless Prosecco for 1.5 hrs) 12-2pm- (doors open at 11.30, Prosecco will start at 12pm and will finish at 1.30pm) 3-5pm- (doors open at 2.45pm, Prosecco will start at 3pm and will finish at 4.30pm) Refund Policy In the unfortunate event that you need to cancel your booking with Party With Ginger, we will give you a full refund or transfer your booking to another Party With Ginger event, providing notice of the cancellation was made by email to info@partywithginger.com 7 days in advance of the event. Requests made within 7 days of the booked event will be offered a transfer to another suitable event, (subject to availability), up until 48 hours before the event. Sadly, for any cancellations within 48 hours of the booked event, we are unable to offer either a refund or transfer of tickets to another event. Reviews 'Get there and then you will wonder why you haven‚Äôt been before - a gem that stands out - really top interactive entertainment- bloody funny loved it - give it up to Ginger Phlappage' 'An incredibly fun way to kick off the weekend. Took my girlfriend for her birthday and she absolutely loved every minute!' 'As an avid bottomless bruncher I can honestly say this is the best I've been to! Two courses (!!) of tasty food, really generous with the drinks and entertainment absolutely hilarious. They make a huge fuss of any birthday or hen or special occasion guests which I think is brilliant and the communal tables encourage everyone to chat and have a good time together. Sassy music and great hosts - what more could you want?!'
Title: Gingers Big Drag Bottomless Brunch: 3-5pm
Subtitle: Are you craving an afternoon of glittering, Prosecco-fuelled, drag fabulousness. Well, look no further than Ginger‚Äôs Big Drag Brunch!

Description: Dinner and a movie are soooo last decade. Instead, you can go on a quest to explore the most romantic place in London, made famous by the film starring Julia Roberts and Hugh Grant.  Notting Hill is a vibrant, iconic neighbourhood known for antique markets, colourful architecture and one of the most important street festivals in the world!  Discover the origins of the Notting Hill Carnival, stroll along Portobello Rd, and take a peek at some "musical temples" to learn why this charming neighbourhood has become a long-term destination for celebrities. AÔªøre you ready to find Notting but Love? We are inviting you two (or you three - hey, we don‚Äôt judge!) to a romantic couples activity that‚Äôs part outdoor escape room, part scavenger hunt and part walking tour.  We promise this experience will make you want to kiss and tell <3. We‚Äôve hosted more than 20.000 dates this year. So, we‚Äôre pretty sure you will absolutely love it too!  If you don‚Äôt, let us know and we‚Äôll live the rest of our lives in shame. So, we‚Äôre pretty sure you will absolutely love it too!  But if you don‚Äôt, let us know and we‚Äôll live the rest of our lives in shame. WHAT WILL YOU DO‚ùì - Prepare your camera to photograph the most colourful and Instagrammable streets. - Stroll through blockbuster film locations like Notting Hill, Love Actually, Paddington, and more. - Be amazed by one of the most ridiculous taxes ever. - Visit the places where great music stars have drunk, played, and died. - Learn how Caribbean immigrants changed the course of British history. HOW DOES IT WORK‚ùì The entire experience is delivered through a mobile app. 1. Book your tickets üé´. 2. Get the instructions via email. 3. Download the Questo mobile app (as instructed via email) and head to the starting point on any day that you chooseüìç. 4Ôªø. Invite your significant one. FEATURES ‚úîÔ∏è - Available 24/7. - Pause and resume anytime. - Private. -Ôªø A bunch of cute & instagrammable places. WHEN CAN YOU TRY THIS EXPERIENCE‚ùì - date night - anniversary - birthday celebration - holiday date - Valentine‚Äôs Day - as a gift for any occasion AÔªøGE RECOMMENDATION If you have little ones and want to bring them along with you, feel free to do so, this experience is kid friendly.

Description: Come and get the chance to speak in a supportive and friendly environment. Public Speaking will boost your confidence and give you more power to speak and to be listened to in both your personal and professional life.  What makes this public speaking session different from others you ask? There is a strong emphasis on self-expression, creativity, trial and error, and most importantly, speaking practice! What will you gain from this event? Here's how it works: *ÔªøWe have multiple coaches and formats to suit the audience/member abilities so we change it up to accommodate to everyone attending and to keep it challenging.* You will speak for 2 minutes on a random topic given by the audience 2 or 3 times.  We will do 2-3 rounds of speaking followed by a feedback session at the end of the workshop. Public speaking suggestions:  TIP: Give your impromptu speech the following 3 sections below.  Each speech is to be 2 minutes long. Audience size 10-15 people. My most important tip - Patience. Public Speaking is a non-linear journey and practice does really make perfect.  Dress Code: There is no dress code. It is best practice however, that you wear the attire for the occasion which you are practicing for.  Where to find us: Closest underground stations: Bank and Liverpool Street - both 5-7  minutes walk away Theatre Deli Studios  107 Leadenhall Street EC3A 4AF Should you have any problems locating the venue, please feel free to contact me before the start of the event.  *Please note we start and end strictly on time*  *You will be refused entry beyond 4:10pm, so please reschedule if you should not make it* EVENT DURATION: 3:45pm - Registration :: 4:00pm - Event start - 6:00pm - End *This event is FREE - for first timers only* - FIRST TIMERS PLEASE NOTE: You MUST book a free "First timer" ticket through Eventbrite and present this on attendance. Failure to do so means that you will need to pay ¬£15. This is a measure intended to keep control of the number of students attending the event.  Cost:  ¬£15 per session  First-timers only discount: ¬£35 for 5 sessions. Please speak to the organiser about registration. (These can be used within 60 days and you can attend any of our public speaking practice sessions on any day.) Payment methods: Cash in hand, Card reader, or pay on www.veespeak.co.uk  _Ôªø_________________________________________________________________________ Marketing and email subscription disclaimer: We value your privacy, and would never we will never share or sell your details to a 3rd Party. Email Subscription: By signing up and attending our events you explicitly agree to be contacted by email from Veespeak's marketing team regarding our newest courses, discounts, and upcoming events. You can always opt-out if you feel the information shared is no longer relevant to you. We may take pictures or record sections of the workshops for training and quality purposes. We will never use this information without your prior consent. _Ôªø_________________________________________________________________________ Website & Social Media:  Website: www.veespeak.co.uk  Facebook: @veespeak - https://www.facebook.com/veespeak/  Linkedin: @veespeak - https://www.linkedin.com/company/veespeak  Meetup Group: https://www.meetup.com/veespeak _Ôªø_________________________________________________________________________ Contact Information: Email: hello@veespeak.co.uk Contact No: 07713 123321 Valentin Todorov - Organiser
Title: Public Speaking Practice Saturday (FREE for first timers)
Subtitle: Beginner friendly public speaking practice sessions.

Description: Come, take the mic and talk/sing/dance/perform in whichever way you see fit. All performances are welcome. We want to cultivate a welcoming energy where we all feel comfortable to stand in front of people and just go for it! If you want to just sit and relax or don't know for sure whether you are up for performing with an audience, you're also welcome to come and take a look at what‚Äôs on. Maybe you find the inspiration to take the mic next time. Instruments are not going to be available, but you're welcome to bring your own. Time will be limited to five minutes per appearance.  You can sign up more than once if there is enough space. Accessibility: The Centre's accessibility statement is here. Covid and mpox safety at the London LGBTQ+ Community Centre: To keep our community safe, we ask that all visitors do not visit the Centre if they are feeling unwell including headache, fever, sore throat, consistent cough, chills and unusual spots, scabs or ulcers. You can wear a mask if you feel more comfortable. We also have masks and hand sanitiser available at the Centre. For current information on Covid-19 and mpox please visit the NHS website.
Title: Queer Open Mic
Subtitle: For all LGBTQ+ performers!

Description: Blessings beautiful goddesses ü§≤üèΩüå∏ (and any wanting to connect & understand the energy of the feminine) A space to come and receive wisdom on the energetics of the divine feminine and how to navigate it in your life üîÆ‚ú®üíï In this workshop we explore the pillars of the divine feminine, what they are and how we can embody them in how we feel and move through this world. We all have masculine & feminine energy within us but for those that identity as feminine and/or have a womb it‚Äôs of the most importance to connect to the archetypes within the feminine, so that our life flows in more ease, abundance & love. We will learn the theory/knowledge behind each pillar, and then I will guide you and teach you tools for your mindset & embodiment that you can take with you throughout your day to day. Including physical exercises, affirmations, visualitions, meditations, poses & sounds. We will also discuss yoni care/health & practices of connection to our sacred space. I will incorporate all aspects of healing available within embodying the divine feminine. Open to all levels of prior knowledge or practice within the elements of the feminine. The theory, knowledge and embodiment is divided into 4 separate workshops ‚ú® (You do not have to attend all, and can come back another month to come to one different workshop you missed if you wish) Class 1: Purification of the womb Class 2: Pillars of the divine feminine Class 3: Divine feminine through the chakras Class 4: Moon cycles & yoni care Jan & Feb Schedule: Week of 29th Jan: Class 1 Week of 12th Feb: Class 2 Week of 19th Feb: Class 3 Week of 26th Feb: Class 4 Note: Monday slots are online classes via zoom. Description: EAST LONDON'S ORIGINAL PUB CRAWL Pub, Bar, & Club Mix 5 REASONS TO CRAWL WITH US! #1 - FREE ENTRY to 5 quirky bars & clubs #2 - Enjoy a FREE SHOT in each venue #3 - Exclusive DRINKS DEALS all night long! #4 ‚Äì A PHOTOGRAPHER will capture all the nights fun and frolics! #5 - Our CHEEKY HOSTS will show you around trendy Shoreditch So join locals and tourists and get ready to party! Our top-rated Pub Crawl was the first to break into Shoreditch - 7 years on we're still smashing it! What was once a grimy gangster's haven in the East End is now a certified hub of all that's hip and happening in London. There's plenty of new, trendy clubs and bars nestled down each graffiti covered street. Our Shoreditch Pub Crawl will help you discover some of the best venues, off the beaten track of the tourists. Fantastic Party Pub Crawl guides will lead you and your pack of Crawlers to 5 great venues, get the party started, encourage you to mingle and take photos all night! INFO WHEN? 7.30-8.30pm, every Friday & Saturday! WHERE? Shoreditch Balls:  (333 Old Street, EC1V 9LE) Our Hosts will be just inside the venue, wearing orange lanyards. DON‚ÄôT FORGET ID! A physical, valid ID (Passport, Drivers Licence) - no copies or photos.
Title: Shoreditch Party Pub Crawl
Subtitle: Our Shoreditch Pub Crawl takes you off the beaten track to London's trendiest neighbourhood - experience a different side to the capital!

Description: The Great Game Treasure Hunt Hyde Park is a unique outdoor treasure hunt.  We are rated 5/5 on Google and 4.5/5 on TripAdvisor! The hunt will lead you around the city taking in all its famous landmarks and explaining a little bit of its history along the way. You are given a treasure map, compass and clues to find your way along the route. If you are successful you will reveal where to draw the X on your treasure map to show the location of your treasure - a great pub! At the pub you will receive discount off your bill.¬† It's one of the best activities to do in Hyde Park or days out in Hyde Park you can find! :) It can also be done as a Team Building Exercise or Corporate day out! What to expect: An exciting day out. Exploring famous landmarks and secret back streets. Challenge yourself with puzzles, riddles, codes and orienteering work. If you are successful you will reveal where to draw the X on your treasure map to locate the treasure. The treasure is a great pub at which you can receive 20% off your total food and drink bill. We will book a table at the pub so it's ready and waiting when you arrive. What's in the pack: Clues sheet Treasure map Clipboard Compass Prize envelope (contains a history of the pub and an activity pack) Wristbands for receiving the 20% discount at the pub. Please bring your own pen to help us save on plastic and our carbon footprint :) How to book: Choose your ticket for 1-2 people, 2-4 people or 5-8 people. You only need one ticket per group of this size. After purchase email¬†info@ggtreasurehunts.com¬†to redeem your ticket. Please include a¬†posting address¬†in your email! Please tell us¬†what time you are starting¬†in your email! It takes around 2-3 hours to complete and we will book a table under your name at the treasure pub. Your pack will be posted to you please allow up to 5 working days for it to arrive. Please note your tickets are flexible and can be chosen on any day that suits you. Pub opening times and kitchen times can be found on our website. U18's¬†are allowed in the pubs during the day but in the evenings some venues might not, please check on our website for these times also. Digital packs If you don't have the time to wait for the physical pack to be posted then ask for the digital pack in your email. This is a PDF of the hunt for you to print out or use on a mobile device, provided is a unique code use this to get the discount for your group. If you get a digital pack then we advise you print the hunt out or bring along a notepad to help with the workings out + a compass or compass app.  :) Good luck!
Title: Hyde Park London Fun Puzzle Treasure Hunt! :)
Subtitle: Go on a super fun puzzle treasure hunt in London's Hyde Park, where you can crack codes, solve riddles, and discover hidden gems!

Description: Join us on a culinary expedition like no other at Ayllu's continuous offer for Tasting Menus. Prepare your taste buds for a mesmerising journey that will transport you straight to the vibrant streets of Latin America & Japan! Indulge in a tantalising experience with our three incredible Tasting Menus: Lima ¬£39pp, Cuzco ¬£49pp, and Machu Picchu ¬£65pp. Each menu is thoughtfully crafted to showcase the rich and diverse flavours of Japanese & Peruvian cuisine, designed to satisfy even the most discerning palates. Picture yourself starting with the Tasting Lima ¬£39pp menu, where you'll savour the succulent Salted Edamame Beans Ceviche Mixto, bursting with sea bass, octopus, and the perfect balance of coriander, lime juice, and cancha. And that's just the beginning! From the melt-in-your-mouth beef Croquettes to the flavourful Trio of Tacos, Uramaki Salmon, each dish is a work of culinary art. If you're craving something even more extraordinary, embark on the Tasting Cuzco ¬£49pp adventure. Delight in the tantalising combination of Salted Edamame Beans, delectable Salmon and Tuna Tacos, and the bold flavours of Yellowtail tiradito and Grilled Aubergine. The extraordinary Duck Leg Pato Confitado and the succulent Black Cod marinated for 48 hours in miso will leave you craving more. For the ultimate gastronomic experience, join us for the Ayllu Tasting Machu Picchu ¬£65pp. Relish the freshness of Duo of Oysters, revel in the flavours of Beef Tataki and Unagi Roll, and luxuriate in the rich and creamy Grilled Salmon Cazuela. Indulge in the Peruvian BBQ served with yucas bravas and seasonal salad, and let our Chef's Choice Dessert be the perfect finale to an unforgettable evening. At Ayllu, we take pride in creating not just a meal but a complete sensory experience. Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere, from the inviting decor to the expertly curated menu, we guarantee an evening you won't soon forget. We can't wait to welcome you to our Nikkei culinary paradise.
Title: Experience Unforgettable Tasting Menus at Ayllu
Subtitle: Join us on a culinary expedition like no other at Ayllu's continuous offer for Tasting Menus.

Description:
Enjoy my cool night-themed tours for all that love to party!!!
 
 As a local that has lived in this great city for so many years, not many would understand the inner-workings of London better than me. While visiting the London Eye and other famous monuments on your holiday is a must, some on the best parts of London you can only get to see after lights out.
 
 This exciting tour starts at Old Street Station and you‚Äôll go on to explore Shoreditch; the best place in London for those that enjoy the night scene. We‚Äôll be visiting 12 different clubs and pubs including; starting with McQueen, you‚Äôll get to see what‚Äôs exciting about a night out in London. We‚Äôll also make our way around XOYO, Floripa, Hoxton 7, the Village underground, The Hoxton Pony, Strongroom bar, CARGO and the Blues Kitchen, Sunset bar, Old Street Records and Trafik. Where you can enjoy shots at discounted prices exclusive to my tour only.
 
 This tour is filled with quirky, fun and shocking visits like you‚Äôd have never experienced before and I‚Äôm sure you‚Äôll enjoy every minute of one of London‚Äôs trendiest towns. This tour will end at Oval Space, an iconic area which is just as stunning as it is fun, from there you will have the opportunity to enjoy the rest of your night at any of our visited destinations.
 
 PLEASE BE AWARE :
 10 maximum in a group per tour, each tour needs a minimum of 3 people to go ahead.
Title: Amazing Nightlife in London East
Subtitle: Enjoy my cool night-themed tours for all that love to party!! See some on the best parts of London you can only get to see after lights out.

Description: Come and join us for a pottery painting session. You will be able to choose from a large selection of pottery items like mugs, bowls, plates, jewelry boxes, jars, figurines, animals, princesses, cars... The price you pay to reserve the session is the studio fee per person. The total price for the session will depend on the materials you use on the day. Overview: These sessions are a fun and relaxing way to express your inner Picasso and melt (or paint) away your worries of the day. We have over 300 pottery pieces to choose from! We‚Äôll also have friendly studio assistants to help you if needed! To book you pay a ¬£5 Studio Fee and the price of the item you paint you pay for on the day. Our Items start from ¬£20-¬£45. We look forward to pottery painting with you! Description: The Trial of Jemmy Button A new verbatim play based on old documents and letters directed by Luis Gayol Wednesdays to Saturdays 7.30pm, from February 14th to March 9th 2023. It was the year 1830 when a young aboriginal from Tierra del Fuego was abducted and brought to England. As he was exchanged for a large pearl button, he was given the name of Jemmy Button. He was spared from being exhibited in a human zoo, as was the custom of the time; instead, he was sent to school to be indoctrinated in all aspects of English culture and the Christian religion. After some time, he was put on a boat and returned to his land ‚Äì the famous voyage of the Beagle, with Charles Darwin on board ‚Äì in the hope that he would spread ‚Äúcivilization‚Äù among the members of his community. The idea for this piece was born around a table in Buenos Aires as a way to answer the question: How is it possible to create a play that touches on the subject of national identities colliding with each other? What are the consequences, and what forms of dominance and resistance could emerge from that collision?
Title: The Trial of Jemmy Button
Subtitle: A Verbatim play based on old documents and letters  telling the story of Jemmy Button, Darwin, FitzRoy and the journey of the  Beagle.

Description: üèõÔ∏è  Discover historical landmarks & hidden gems üïµ‚Äç‚ôÄ  Find clues & solve cryptic puzzles üß≠  Self-guided tour ‚Äì do whenever you like & at your own pace üç∫  Plenty of historical pubs along the route ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê Average Tripadvisor rating (across all trails) is 4.9/5! Well, you‚Äôve come to the right place, detective! The Monopoly Murders is an immersive treasure hunt with a whodunit twist. This imaginative self-guided city tour experience leads you on a thrilling journey past some of Europe‚Äôs most visited attractions. Along the way, you‚Äôll discover historical landmarks and hidden gems, solve cryptic puzzles and find hidden clues to ultimately deduce whodunit. The game is afoot! The Monopoly Murders ‚Äì West End Murder Mystery Trail is a self-guided walking tour that navigates you past some of the best historical landmarks the UK has to offer, including: üìç Trafalgar Square üìç The National Gallery üìç Somerset House üìç Covent Garden üìç Leicester Square üìç China Town üìç Piccadilly Circus üìç Buckingham Palace üìç and many hidden gems The route of this London treasure hunt is relatively flat and approximately 4km long. Allow 3 hours to appreciate your surroundings and complete the trail at a leisurely pace. There are plenty of refreshment stops and photo opportunities along the way. This trail focuses on London‚Äôs West End area. We also have another trail which explores the City of London. Both trails make such a great way to discover London‚Äôs must-see landmarks! Ideal for tourists and locals alike. So, what are you waiting for?! ‚Ä¢ Start and end location: Trafalgar Square, WC2N 5DN (the trail is a loop). View on Google Maps ‚Ä¢ Clue difficulty: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê ‚Ä¢ Duration: ~3 hours ‚Ä¢ Distance: 4km ‚Ä¢ Terrain: Easy ‚Ä¢ Wheelchair/buggy accessible: No* Christian in room #004‚Ä¶ Trinity Harlot in a sleazy bar‚Ä¶ And now Lucy ‚ÄúDeucey‚Äù Jellicoe in Convent Garden. Three murders with a deliberate trail of taunting calling cards left by the cunning culprit. You face your most formidable challenge yet, with wits matched against an egotistical maniac. Can you deduce who the serial killer is and end this sequence of catastrophes before they strike again? ‚Ä¢ Receive two high-quality printed copies of the trail through your letter box! ‚Ä¢ Printed on 120gsm white uncoated A4 paper with a single-sided print. ‚Ä¢ One staple in the top left corner of each copy. ‚Ä¢ FREE delivery! ‚Ä¢ We ship to the UK only. Unfortunately, we don‚Äôt deliver to Jersey, Guernsey or the Republic of Ireland. If you order from another country you will be refunded. International customers, please visit our Killer Trail Etsy store! ‚Ä¢ 2-3 working days for delivery. We deliver using Royal Mail tracked; delivery times are estimates.  ‚Ä¢ Book your trail here or via killertrails.co.uk. Only one purchase required for a group of up to 6 people. ‚Ä¢ Our trails are self-guided. This means you can do the trail whenever you like. You don't have to do it on the specific day you've booked.  ‚Ä¢ If you need the trail urgently and/or you'd rather print it off yourself, please let us know in the email and we will send you a digital PDF instead. Or alternatively, you can order a digital PDF of this trail here. *The route is all paved or solid. Some road crossing points may not have dropped kerbs. Some of the route has cobbled streets.
Title: London West End Murder Mystery Trail (Whodunit Treasure Hunt) Killer Trails
Subtitle: Explore the eerie streets of London with a murder mystery treasure hunt. Discover landmarks, find clues & solve puzzles to deduce whodunit!

She played at events like Tomorrowland, Wish, Thuishaven, HRFST and Guaba Beach Bar (Cyprus) in 2023 and has shared the stage with renowned artists such as Reinier Zonneveld, Alignment, Stan Christ & Kiki Solvej. Amber Broos is a young DJ from Belgium with a true passion for music. With her own monthly show on Tomorrowland‚Äôs official radio station One World Radio and as a resident for the Belgian leading radio Studio Brussel she makes her audience forget that she is only twenty years old. Description: Our in-house beer sommelier, Helen, is an expert in the German brewing tradition. You'll learn everything about our beer! From the brewhouse to the operation room and much more! Elephant & Castle is our largest brewery and beer garden in London! The tour is completely tailored to you. With no rush around the brewery and a fountain of knowledge at your hand. You will not be disappointed. You will then taste a range of our beers with a detailed explanation of each taste profile and the difference in ingredients & production. We invite you to stick around and enjoy our tank-fresh beer. This tour is perfect for a bigger group of people interested in seeing German Kraft's journey from the beginning. With each booking, you will also get a reserved table.  Please have closed footwear. Duration - 2 hours (approximately) Included - 4 x half pints If you want to read up on us beforehand, head to our website or social media channels: Facebook & Instagram
Title: German Krafts Flagship Brewery Tour & Tasting
Subtitle: This tour is perfect for people interested in seeing German Kraft Brewing behind the scenes.

Description: This game is perfect for exciting unique team building days out for team bonding & to discover the city! We are rated 5/5 on Google and 4.5/5 on TripAdvisor! Get ready for an exhilarating treasure hunt experience! Can you complete the hunt and find the treasure? The treasure is a great venue at which we will organise food & drink for your party. You can start anywhere you like in or on the outskirts of St James or Green Park. All the questions are scattered around this area and the game isn't linear. GAMEPLAY ‚Ä¢ Load the app on your phone one phone per team. ‚Ä¢ Explore your surroundings to find 30 thrilling questions/challenges. ‚Ä¢ Prepare for a mix of environment-related questions, brain teasers, puzzles, and trivia. ‚Ä¢ Each challenge is worth 50 points, but you only have 5 minutes to conquer it. ‚Ä¢ There are some bonus questions each worth double points. ‚Ä¢ Some challenges are tougher than others, so be ready for a real test of your skills. ‚Ä¢ With a time limit of 2 hours, you‚Äôll need to be quick and plan an efficient route to tackle as many questions as possible. ‚Ä¢ At the end you will reveal your treasure - a great venue for your party! ‚Ä¢ If you are playing in teams see your scores on a live leader board and purchase weapons to slow other teams down! HOW TO PLAY ‚Ä¢ Mobile Phones: Make sure each team has a fully charged mobile phone (up to 50% battery usage during the game) and some data. You‚Äôll need an internet connection or data to initially download the game, but subsequent connections will be required only for occasional photo downloads and uploads. ‚Ä¢ Starting: To begin, access the game using the provided link or QR code. Before diving in, carefully read the instructions on how to play. ‚Ä¢ Time: The game is set for 2 hours which starts as soon as you have read the instructions and are prompted to ‚ÄòStart game‚Äô (there is a warning written above this button). ‚Ä¢ Finishing: The game ends if a team either: ‚Ä¢ Completes all the questions. ‚Ä¢ The time runs out. ‚Ä¢ After finishing, you‚Äôll receive directions to the end venue for a well-deserved celebration. Prepare yourselves for an unforgettable adventure filled with challenges, competition, and the thrill of the hunt. Good luck! HOW TO BOOK ‚Ä¢ The time runs out. Choose your number of people (every 4 people make a team, played on 1 phone). ‚Ä¢ The time runs out.After purchase email info@ggtreasurehunts.com to finalise the details of your event, this can be played on any day and there are several options for what venue to end at and what food & drink to have. Good luck!

Prepare yourselves for an unforgettable adventure filled with challenges, competition, and the thrill of the hunt. Good luck! HOW TO BOOK: Please note your tickets are flexible and can be chosen on any day that suits you. Pub opening times and kitchen times can be found on our website. U18's are allowed in the pubs during the day but in the evenings some venues might not, please check on our website for these times also. Good luck!

Description: Beker Studio offers an instructive course: Screen Printing for Beginners. This is a one-day course, providing guidance on screen exposure and printing on fabric and paper surfaces. You will have the opportunity to work in a fully equipped print and dye studio built for research, design development, and small-scale manufacturing. This course covers many of the practical elements applicable to various printing projects with plenty of time to experiment, making it great value for money. Morning Session: Prepare the screen, including coating it with photosensitive emulsion, exposing it to create a stencil, and washing out the stencil. A quick look at open screen printing and paper stencils. A range of binders, pigments and special effects like foil and flock are reviewed. Break for lunch (lunch isn't provided on this course) Afternoon Session: You'll learn colour alignment (registration), experiment with offset printing, and explore screen masking. The rest of the day is dedicated to hands-on experimentation, where you'll apply your newfound knowledge. Design and artwork preparation: Before the course begins contact the studio for tips on how to prepare or select a design for printing. Special Offers: Sign up for two days. Jump on the next course with a 20% discount. This option allows you to work independently with your exposed screens with a studio technician present. Bring a friend or relative: 20% off the second course place. You can purchase the extra spaces using the add-on feature. Course Details:
Title: Screen printing for beginners: Short Courses
Subtitle: Spark your creativity ! Join Beker Studio's Screen Printing for Beginners course. Learn screen exposure and print on fabric/paper.

And when we say life drawing, we‚Äôre not talking the ceiling of the Sistine Chapel. Our philosophy is simple: our sessions are to fine art what karaoke is to singing. Forget perfection: our number rule is that you can‚Äôt make a mistake. Our world-class performers will inspire your inner artist. If youwant to draw boring old stills of the Mona Lisa holding a bowl of fruit, this is not for you. You‚Äôll be drawing mesmerising burlesque and cabaret artists while being guided by our Evil Headmaster, award-winning cabaret legend Dusty Limits. Expect a diverse range of subjects to depict accurately, or inaccurately, we really don‚Äôt care. Prizes are awarded for energy and imagination, not skill.

Description: Descubre todos los secretos del Londres m√°s antiguo con nuestro Free Tour Londres a orillas del T√°mesis, un paseo desde la Catedral de St Paul hasta Tower Bridge, donde te contaremos su origen, su historia y sus principales monumentos y calles. El tour comienza en la Catedral de San Pablo, la catedral anglicana de Londres y la m√°s grande de la capital. Mientras descubrimos c√≥mo se organiza la City de Londres, cruzaremos el Millenium Bridge hasta llegar a la zona de Bankside. All√≠ recorreremos una de las zonas mas populares y tur√≠sticas actuales de la ciudad, donde los antiguos londinenses ven√≠an a divertirse al teatro y al circo. A d√≠a de hoy encontraremos la galer√≠a de arte moderno Tate Modern, el Globe Theatre, una reproducci√≥n del teatro original en el que William Shakespeare interpret√≥ sus obras m√°s conocidas; y la prisi√≥n Clink, una de las c√°rceles m√°s antiguas de la ciudad. Desde el mirador tendremos unas vistas impresionantes de los rascacielos de la City y otros monumentos, como el London Bridge. Tambi√©n conoceremos la Catedral de Southwark, el Borough Market, el mercado m√°s antiguo de Londres al que ven√≠an los londinenses a hacer sus compras, y The Shard, el rascacielos m√°s alto de la Uni√≥n Europea. El tour finaliza en City Hall, el Ayuntamiento de Londres cuyo edificio fue dise√±ado por Norman Foster. Desde aqu√≠ veremos dos de los monumentos m√°s emblem√°ticos de Londres: el Tower Bridge, el puente m√°s famoso de la ciudad, y la Torre de Londres, donde se guardan las Joyas de la Corona, pero que realmente es famosa por haber sido una de las prisiones m√°s temibles de Londres. ¬øC√≥mo encontrar al gu√≠a?
Title: Free Tour Londres a Orillas del T√°mesis
Subtitle: Conoce c√≥mo era la vida en el Londres antiguo y qu√© hac√≠an los londinenses para divertirse.

Description: This course is perfect for women of all ages and experience levels who want to learn the art of belly dancing in a safe and supportive environment. Whether you're a complete beginner or have some experience, our experienced instructor will guide you through the basics of belly dance, step by step. Our class is designed to help you feel comfortable and confident as you learn the beautiful and empowering movements of this ancient art form. In our beginner's taster class, you'll learn essential techniques such as hip circles, shimmies, and figure eights, as well as how to isolate different parts of your body, including your hips, chest, and arms.  We'll begin with a gentle warm-up and stretching to prepare your body, and our instructor will demonstrate each movement and provide individualized feedback to help you perfect your technique. You'll also have the opportunity to dance with other women who are learning, creating a supportive community where you can feel comfortable and inspired. Our studio is a safe space where you can learn belly dance at your own pace, free from judgment or pressure. We believe that belly dance is for everyone, and our class is designed to be accessible and welcoming to women of all ages and abilities. So come join us and discover the joy and beauty of belly dance! IÔªømportant: Please arrive 15 minutes in advance, as class will start promptly.  Bring with you a bottle of water, a hip scarf (optional) and socks/ballet training slippers (optional).
Title: Beginner Belly Dance Class
Subtitle: Come and experience the ancient art of belly dance in a safe and women-empowering environment! Perfect for all levels!

Description: Science, sculpture and sacrifice. Politics, philanthropy and protest. Connections and coincidences. We'll look at the remarkable people who lived and worked in this fascinating area. We start near Westminster Abbey and we don't need to move far to discover lots of fascinating history. We finish in the little-known backstreets of central Westminster. This is a short tour in terms of distance but packed with interesting material. The walk lasts 90 minutes to two hours and ends not far from Westminster Abbey. "We learned so much about this beautiful part of London....finding out little nuggets of information on politicians, poets and authors who lived here. it felt like history being brought to life. We cannot recommend David's tours highly enough. Perfect for all the family, all ages, and guaranteed to make you want to go back for more" Kate, Nick and Daisy
Title: Hidden Westminster
Subtitle: Westminster uncovered. You will be astonished. So much to discover in a short time.

Description: Welcome to BAW Burlesque!!! aka... BadAss Women of Burlesque Do you want to be body positive, accepted, and in a judgement free zone? Do you wanna just grab your heels and dance your heart out?  ‚ÄãOur burlesque dance class has been specifically designed for all women who want to feel sexy, and comfortable in their skin but also get that dreaded workout in.  This class is perfect for anyone whose goal is to unleash their inner power and conquer their most confident and empowered self but who doesn't know where to begin. ‚ÄãBurlesque is a female-led, body-positive dance movement that welcomes everyone no matter of gender, age, size, ethnicity or race, or sexuality. At BAW Burlesque we accept and celebrate our differences. We empower and welcome the new and the different. It doesn't matter who you are, only that you bring that sAss to the class! We've created a safe space for all women to come and explore their sensuality. We will be slowing down at our floorwork class, dimming the lights (if we can!), and putting on our sexy clothes. We are taking things down on the floor and working out some body rolls, heel strutting, and booty drops (our faves)! Floorwork class structure: Warm-up - Dynamic stretching and flexibility exercises Main Dance Routine (heels are optional!!) - Learn a routine to a slow, sexy song. Routines change monthly so we have enough time to polish them off and put on our heels with confidence! Cool Down - Slow Down and Relax Equipment: - Heels (optional) Any of the following is recommended for this class:  -Kneepads, over-the-knee socks, or leggings. * Please bring a bottle of water and a towel, wear comfortable clothing and have a pair of heels ready, if you wish to take it to the next level! Please Note: Parts of the classes will be filmed with your consent and footage is used for promotional purposes only.  *ÔªøPlease arrive 15 minutes earlier at the location to get changed and get ready. We still welcome those who are late. Please call the number on your ticket to be let into the building, or if you get lost or are running late. We look forward to welcoming you soon!!! Stay awesome :)
Title: Beginner Burlesque Class
Subtitle: Burlesque is all about sensual movements, we will be burning the floor with badass attitude and practising confidence.

Description: Alchemic Chakras Activation Join us for an enchanting, magical and unique evening of Alchemic Chakras Activation every Wednesday  at 18:30 and every Saturday at 10:30am in the heart of London. This transformative event will take place at the ultimate wellness & movement studio - Astraea London - 49 Effra Road, London, SW2 1BZ. Unlock the power within as we explore the ancient wisdom of chakras and alchemy. Through a series of interactive workshops, meditations, and energy healing practices, you will learn to balance and align your chakras, promoting harmony and well-being in your life. Discover the secrets of alchemy and how it can be applied to your spiritual journey. Our experienced facilitator will guide you through practical exercises, empowering you to tap into your inner alchemist and awaken your true potential. WÔªøhat to expect: Experience profound healing: Dive deep into your energy centers and dissolve blockages, revitalizing your mind, body, and spirit. Ignite your inner potential: Awaken dormant energies, enhancing your intuition, creativity, and personal power. Find balance and harmony: Align your chakras, leading to a life filled with inner peace, purpose, and radiant health. Connect with a vibrant community: Join a group of kindred spirits, all seeking growth, healing, and spiritual awakening. This is your opportunity to rewrite your story, to become the alchemist of your own life. Don't miss out on this transformative experience.  Whether you are a beginner or have some experience with chakras and alchemy, this event offers a unique opportunity to deepen your understanding and connect with like-minded individuals on a similar path. Don't miss this chance to embark on a profound journey of self-discovery and transformation. Reserve your spot now, embrace the magic of Alchemic Chakras Activation and and let your journey to self-discovery begin!
Title: Alchemic Chakras Activation
Subtitle: Join us for an enchanting, magical and unique evening of Alchemic Chakras Activation & embark on a transformational journey like no other.

Description: Awaken your mind and body to a new level and learn how to practice meditation in motion. The purpose of this yoga lineage is to guide you toward cultivating a conscious connection, integration and awakening of the body, mind, heart and spirit. You will learn and practice Patanjali's 8 limbs of yoga: Work primarily with the Amrit posture sequence, gentle vinyasa flows and extended posture holding times. Explore the deepest levels of body, mind and spirit with the integrative practices of clear intention, breath, meditative awareness and conscious integration. Learn to balance your nervous system with the ‚Äúfirst half‚Äù and ‚Äúsecond half‚Äù of a posture. To transition from an active state of ‚Äúdoing‚Äù a posture, to a relaxed state of ‚Äúbeing‚Äù. And to feel the effects of a posture. Learn to consciously encounter your "edge" of body and mind to release deep tensions and restore the natural flow of the vital life force energy (prana). Good for all levels, from those with some experience to more experienced practitioners. Some experience with yoga and postures is recommended. BIOGRAPHY I have been guiding spiritual seekers for over 30 years with the self-transformative teachings of yoga, meditation, Ayurveda and breathing. It is my pleasure and honor to guide you toward self-empowerment, transformation and awakened consciousness. I will help you connect to your deepest self and inner guide, from the physical to the soul dimension. SOULDIMENSION.ORG Copyright ¬© 2022 ‚Ä¢ Soul Dimension
Title: Awakening Yoga ‚Ä¢ Weekly Class ‚Ä¢ London
Subtitle: Weekly online class with a spiritual focus to awaken one‚Äôs consciousness and highest potential.

Description: Step into the extraordinary at Trapeze Saturdays, Shoreditch‚Äôs premier destination for an unforgettable weekend experience! Beyond the doors of our venue lies a world where the weird and wonderful collide, offering a unique and unparalleled party atmosphere. As Shoreditch‚Äôs unrivaled Saturday night hotspot, Trapeze invites you to elevate your weekend with a perfect blend of celebration and good vibes. Our Happy Hour offerings, expertly curated by skilled bartenders, set the stage for an evening of indulgence and excitement. The magic extends beyond the bar, with our resident DJ taking center stage to craft a sonic journey that transcends genres. From the pulsating beats of HipHop and the smooth melodies of R&B to the infectious rhythms of House and the nostalgia-inducing Throwback tunes, our DJs create an epic soundtrack that propels the energy of the night to new heights. Trapeze is not just a party‚Äîit‚Äôs an immersive experience, a sensory feast that ignites your senses and leaves a lasting impression on your soul. Description: Private Tours also available any date/time on request (minimum 15 people)¬†email us. ¬† Departs Outside Entrance to Cutty Sark Tall Ship, Greenwich ¬† Discover the darker side of Greenwich World Heritage Site. Hear of drunken sailors sent to "Shanghai",¬† the Cutty Sark Curse, ghosts of jilted lovers who cannot move on and Royal Family members whose dabble with the occult has left their spirits to linger. Explore hidden laneways, London's oldest park, the creepiest tunnel in the UK and Royal secrets. Includes a visit to Charles Dickens' favourite haunted pub. Duration:¬† 1.5¬† hours ¬†Venue: Mixture of indoors and outdoors Terrain: Leisurely 2 km of¬†walking, flat paths with small steps Paranormal Activity: Moderate *Parental discretion advised. Adult content.
Title: Royal Maritime Greenwich Ghost Tour
Subtitle: Discover the darker side of Greenwich World Heritage Site. Hear of drunken sailors, the Cutty Sark Curse and ghost ships.
