Description: PLEASE NOTE! WÔªøe are really glad you found us- and its fine for you to buy tickets here- however- we pay ¬£1.76 per ticket sale to eventbrite which is a lot!! In future it would be very helpful for you to consider buying tickets directly from us via our website Londondrawing.com oÔªør even better! No need to book- just arrive and by cash or paypal on the door- see the paypal link below NEW! Our 4-6pm session every Saturday is now a long pose session. We will start with a few quick ones and then do one or two poses for the whole class to give you the chance to really concentrate on building up your drawing. This class is a great one to take in combination with the earlier 1.30-3.30pm class which is more fast paced. If you take two sessions, your second session is ¬£10 (pay for your second class on the day- cash ideally) so its a great option for making an afternoon of it! All our weekly life classes classes are drop in ‚Äì no need to book ahead- just arrive and pay cash/ paypal on the door- PayPal link or you can buy tickets here via Eventbrite (usually you can buy tickets directly from our website - but this is currently being updated- so we have temporarily moved ticket sales here) NÔªøEW!: Under 25 / Student discount- Pay ¬£10 for your class! iIf you are a student or aged under 25 we are offering ¬£10 tickets- we  trust you to buy your tickets accordingly so please be honest about your situation-we appreciate it. There are limited concession tickets for this session To keep up to date with classes, its helpful for us if you register your interest ‚Äì email us at info@londondrawing.com Its so great to welcome you into the studio for our weekly drop in life drawing sessions! WAC is an amazing community hub which has been serving Lambeth and its vulnerable citizans as well as providing free legal advice for the past 50 years-  and our classes help support the charity. As with all our drop in classes- expect professional tutors and models in an inspiring and unique space. With poses from 30 seconds to one hour- there is something for everyone. This is a general life drawing class with tuition for beginners and advice for those who are more experienced, all designed to encourage you to develop your own style and approach. Don‚Äôt come to class if you feel ill- you can rebook to another date- just email info@londondrawing.com We have plenty of room- drop in places available- cash or PayPal on the door- or buy tickets ahead Easels and drawing boards provided Materials available to buy, or bring your own- Paper 20p per sheet, charcoal 25p per stick Saturday Studio 4-6pm ¬£15  ¬£10 student/ under 25 concession Tickets in advance ‚Äì or cash / PayPal on the door We also run a morning session 11-1pm just down the road at Vaulty Towers Pub And an early afternoon session 1.30-3.30pm at WAC Venue: The Waterloo Action Centre 14 Baylis Road SE1 7AA
Title: SATURDAY STUDIO LONG POSE SESSION: 4-6PM:  Drop In Life Drawing Waterloo
Subtitle: Join us every Saturday longer poses- in our light studio with great tuition and models, a brilliant way to spend the afternoon!

Description: Enjoy Baji Zhandao Kung-Fu classes in beautiful Battersea Park! About our class Learn martial art techniques, become more flexible and improve your health at the same time. To ensure you don't miss out, please ensure you register for any beginners package by 10am latest on the same day to avoid disappointment. How much? **Beginners package just ¬£40 for six lessons, less than half the price of regular lessons!! Limited offer, only until end February 2024!!** Over your first six lessons, you can expect to learn: - several techniques to deal with punches - learn how to avoid attacks by using the ground correctly - start to learn our first Baji Zhandao form including relating self-defence techniques - improve your general flexibility/mobility - learn your first Qigong meditation breathing practice for internal health. This will set you up well for your self-defence journey! Please note: Beginners packages are non-refundable and must be used up within two months. This is to encourage new students to train regularly so that the techniques start to become muscle and mind memory, if you ever had to use your skills in a self-defence situation ‚Äì hopefully never! After your beginner package has ended, I can discuss future class prices. If you have any questions, I am very happy to answer them. Please direct them to joe.cheung75@gmail.com or contact me directly on 07914411979. Where? We meet every Saturday 2.30-4.30pm in Battersea Park by the central Bandstand. Who is it for? No previous experience is required. All abilities, fitness levels, men and women are welcome. Although training is only available to people aged 16 and over. Do I need any special equipment? Loose clothing is advised but no special clothing or equipment is needed, only a willingness to learn. What do you do in a class? A typical class lasts two hours and involves self-defense drills. We also cover: - weapons handling and applications - iron shirt/palm conditioning - form practice - flexibility and mobility exercises - Qigong (meditation and energy development). My martial art experience Classes are led by Joe Cheung, a black sash instructor in Baji Zhandao Kung Fu. My training includes: ¬∑ Over 10 years Baji Zhandao Kung Fu (2nd Black Sash level) ¬∑ 8 years Bujinkan Ninjitsu (2nd Nidan Black Belt) ¬∑ 2 years Urban Krav Maga My contact details Please email me at joe.cheung75@gmail.com for more details. Also please let me know if you have to cancel at the last minute. You can also follow me at: https://www.instagram.com/bajizhandaouklondon https://www.facebook.com/BajiSaturdaysLondon www.linkedin.com/in/joe-cheung-baji https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYRC41HCwcPiD1Vy59_5L5g I also offer private 1-1 lessons, please see the following link if you are interested: http://bajizhandao.co.uk/one-on-one-training/ Further details on Baji Zhandao Kung Fu syllabus Zhandao is Mandarin for 'Battlefield Style'. The name derives from the main system we teach which is Baji Zhandao. This is a modern day evolution of a number of internal styles of Kung Fu from China, including: - Baji Quan - Yang Tai Chi Quan - Pigua Zhang - Tongbei Quan - Bagua Zhang - Xingyi Quan The Baji Zhandao system was created and developed by our recently deceased Grandmaster Chen Fu Sheng over the last 20 years. Master Chen was an ex-Chinese special forces instructor, one of the highest level masters of Baji Quan and other styles in China and also one of China‚Äôs greatest Iron Shirt Masters. He had a lot of real world fighting experience, spanning over 50 years as a practitioner, in both military operations and as a combatant due to a number of years working in the Chinese High security Prison service. For further details on Baji Zhandao Kung Fu please visit: http://www.bajizhandao.co.uk.
Title: Baji Zhandao Kung-Fu/Meditation - OUTDOORS class (Adults 16+)
Subtitle: Learn martial art techniques, become more flexible and improve your health.  Our class offers more than the standard gym session!

Description: There‚Äôs no place like OM Sound artist Leo Cosendai‚Äôs first sound installation, OM is a sonic meditation chamber for 4 attendees at a time, featuring Europe's largest gong, more than two metres wide. It was conceived with the intention of creating a timeless meditation device, acting as a portal to other dimensions and states of consciousness. Hosted by the UK‚Äôs finest sound healers, all trained by Leo, participants lay between two gongs which are played in tandem. Woven into the soundscape alongside the gongs are crystal bowls and various meditative instruments. This hour long sound ceremony has an aromatic experience curated by Sara Cosendai with bespoke blends of essential oils, resins and hydrosols to deepen your meditation experience. OM resides in The Other House South Kensington, close to Gloucester Road station. Guests are able to unwind in the comfort of the library or bistro after their session. Ticket terms: Private sessions for 1-4 people can be organised at additional times of the week. Please email wellbeing@otherhouse.com for more details. Follow us on Instagram:@otherhouse_sk/ @leo.cosendai / @om_soundbath / @leo.cosendai / @sara.cosendai ------- ------- Health & Safety:This event is not suitable for the following health conditions: heart conditions (incl. pacemakers), epilepsy, any metal implants inside the body or first the trimester of pregnancy. Please contact your doctor if you are concerned about any health issues ahead of the session. OM cannot be held responsible for any health issues that arise after the session. Om is supported by Tone Of Life which was created by Tom Soltron and Johannes Heimrath, who make incredible gongs. They want to bring the experience of sound to people around the World.
Title: OM Sound Bath At The Other House
Subtitle: Experience an hour's meditation through sound - a savasana in full tangible vibration. Hosted by two of the UK‚Äôs finest sound healers.

Description: Welcome to Gallant Green ParkHunt London: The Drained Battery!Before we start, here are some top tips: If you can't see the water fountain mentioned above, follow these directions from Green Park Underground Station:Leave via the exit marked Green Park Buckingham Palace (pics 2 & 3). If you‚Äôve come out of the correct one you should emerge straight out in front of the black Statue of Goddess Diana Water Fountain so stop there and ignore the rest of the instructions below.If you‚Äôve exited the station at any other exit (there are several), you‚Äôll either be on the north or south side of busy Piccadilly. You should see the trees of Green Park to the south, so enter the park to the LEFT< of the structure with the green roof (pics 4 & 5). If you find yourself taking tea at The Ritz, you‚Äôve gone too far left!If you‚Äôve entered the park via the gate (pic 5), walk along the path for about 70m and there will be a turning on the RIGHT> (pic 6), you should then see the fountain up ahead.Touch Continue when you can see it.The route you‚Äôre going to follow in the city is sprinkled with unique places, fun clues and challenges, and incredible stories. The experience will play out like you‚Äôre the main characters of a movie, only that you‚Äôre experiencing everything in first person! Fun dialogue, intrigue, and unexpected interactions are guaranteed. HOW IT WORKS‚ùì 1. Book your tickets üé´ 2. Download the Questo app - it's free üì≤ 3. Head to the starting pointüìç The game is an interactive activity where you are guided by a mobile app through the city. With it, you follow directions and solve very fun puzzles, riddles, and cryptic codes. During the game, you will also visit popular and hidden places in the city while learning fun (and we mean it) stories about them. This is a storytelling experience just as much. The people doing these city exploration games gave them an average rating of 4.7/5 around the world. Join the playground too! ------------------ More about Questo üö∂‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Questo is an urban entertainment platform offering thematic real-world exploration games. It is currently available in over 150 cities üåé and has entertained hundreds of thousands of players already. As of today, the app offers more than 400 different experiences created by a growing network of local content creators and event organizers.
Title: Gallant Green ParkHunt London Outdoor Escape Game: The Drained Battery
Subtitle: Follow clues, solve puzzles, discover new places and learn incredible stories of the city during this adventure.

Description: Kayak Bus Go with the flow. Kayak Bus is a one-way trip from Battersea all the way to Greenwich. A 100% sightseeing trip, passing all of London's top landmarks, easily viewed from the seat of a kayak, Albert Bridge, Battersea Power, MI6, Big Ben, Houses of Parliament, Bankside, Tower of London, Canary Wharf, and arriving at Greenwich home of Time and the Cutty Sark. See London as its meant to be, from the river. Journey time is a good 3 hours, is with the tidal flow making the trip suitable for all abilities including complete beginners. The cost per person ¬£65 inclusive of VAT and booking fees. FAQs Are there ID requirements or an age limit to enter the event? The event is for adults only. Where does the event start and finish? Your trip will start in Battersea next to St Marys Church. Battersea Church Rd, SW11 3LX Your trip will finish in Greenwich The beach's postcode is SE10 OTH which is close to Enderby House (Pub) on the Riverside. NOTE we are about 10 -10-minute walk east of The Old Naval College in Greenwich or a 15-minute walk west of The Jubilee Line at Greenwich North. What can/can't I bring to the event? Bring comfortable clothes to paddle in, dress for the weather including a pair of training shoes you don't mind getting muddy. Bring a light snack to keep your energy levels up and a bottle of water to stay hydrated. We supply all equipment including good quality waterproofs. Also, bring a complete change of clothes. You have a baggage allowance of 25 litres per person ( small rucksack or carry bag), your bags will go inside a watertight compartment in the kayak and stays 100% dry. Bags must be compressible, no suitcases Where can I contact the organiser with any questions? email info@londonkayakcompany.com call 07741205515 Is my registration/ticket transferrable? Your ticket is only valid for the date of the trip. Any problems contact us.
Title: ** Kayak Bus  (Battersea to Greenwich).
Subtitle: Kayaking trip from Battersea to Greenwich.  Passing through Central London from West to East. Seeing London's famous landmarks en route.

Every Saturday night it‚Äôs time to dim the lights, pop the bottles, get the girls in and get ready to be gagged by our crazy cabaret. Our stunning lineup of incredible London drag performers will be serving serious lip-sync, live vocals, slaying dance breaks, death drops a-go-go, sickening outfits, hilarious comedy and jaw-dropping acts that‚Äôll blast your wig all the way back to the Northern Line. Description: Our sassy Carwash Crew just keep on giving and we‚Äôre super proud to announce our fabulously kitsch Drag Bottomless Brunch with a Pop and Disco Punch, at our resident venue, The Loop Bar!  Kick your happy Saturday vibes off in style with 4 hours of outrageous fun with your friends at the ultimate drag party brunch in central London you want to go to.  We‚Äôll take you back to Lady Marmalade, Dancing Queen and what was acceptable in the 80‚Äôs, so dig out your best neon‚Äôs, shoulder pads and feather boas because bonkers begins here. Shenanigans start from noon every Saturday. Enjoy two courses and free flowing Prosecco for 90 mins to the best non-stop legendary pop and disco soundtrack the capital has to offer before bad ass drag acts join the boozy bash and get you all dancing down in our hidden party playground, Groovy Wonderland, where no one can resist throwing some shapes on our flashing under-lit dancefloor!  Join us for a totally wicked party full of mischief where you can blame it on the boogie. Elevate your weekend and get down with us. 12:00 ‚Äì guests arrive 12:30 ‚Äì 90 mins unlimited Prosecco starts and food is served 13:00 ‚Äì Groovy Wonderland dance floor opens 14:00 ‚Äì Drag Queen entertainment for approx 1 hour 16:00 ‚Äì Event Closes More... Terms & Conditions apply.  We have a very strict no refund policy.  Throughout 2023 Bottomless Brunch orders are bought at your own risk in the event a member of your party tests positive for Covid-19. These bookings are non-refundable or transferable within 7 days of an event.  Please also note our strict no refund policy on all tickets within 7 days of an event, or post event. Are there ID requirements or an age limit to enter the event? This venue operates a strict over 18‚Äôs policy and ID will be required. Valid Passport or Driving License is the only accepted form of ID. Customers may be subject to a search. What are my transport/parking options getting to the event? Oxford Circus / Bond Street Tube are closest. Parking is easier on the north side of Oxford Street. Where can I contact the organiser with any questions? You can email us on hello@carwash.co.uk or phone 020 4558 7944 (Carwash Sales Office)  Is my ticket transferrable? Tickets are not refundable or transferable within 7 days of an event, or post event. Management reserve the right to refuse admission in accordance with licensing laws and in such cases any pre-paid monies will not be refunded. Any tickets that are damaged, defaced or altered will not be accepted. Please see the full T&C's on our website prior to purchase.  To keep up to date why not sign up to our newsletter on the Carwash website home page?
Title: Bottomless Brunch with a Pop & Disco Punch
Subtitle: Carwash has gone bottomless with our fabulously kitsch Drag Bottomless Brunch with a Pop & Disco Punch, at our resident venue, The Loop Bar!

Description: Play a city exploration game in London and discover the successful TV series The Crown. The show focuses on the life and reign of Queen Elizabeth II, who is United Kingdom‚Äôs longest serving monarch to date. While you solve puzzles and riddles in this game, you will find out about royal secrets, some of the series‚Äô film locations and how the British monarchy has survived. Are you up for a ‚Äúroyal‚Äù walk in London? The route you‚Äôre going to follow in the city is sprinkled with unique places, fun clues and challenges, and incredible stories. The experience will play out like you‚Äôre the main characters of a movie, only that you‚Äôre experiencing everything in first person! Fun dialogue, intrigue, and unexpected interactions are guaranteed. HOW IT WORKS‚ùì 1. Book your tickets üé´ 2. Download the Questo app - it's free üì≤ 3. Head to the starting pointüìç WHAT YOU‚ÄôLL DO The game is an interactive activity where you are guided by a mobile app through the city. With it, you follow directions and solve very fun puzzles, riddles, and cryptic codes. During the game, you will also visit popular and hidden places in the city while learning fun (and we mean it) stories about them. This is a storytelling experience just as much. The people doing these city exploration games gave them an average rating of 4.7/5 around the world. Join the playground too! ------------------ More about Questo üö∂‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Questo is an urban entertainment platform offering thematic real-world exploration games. It is currently available in over 150 cities üåé and has entertained hundreds of thousands of players already. As of today, the app offers more than 400 different experiences created by a growing network of local content creators and event organizers.
Title: London Outdoor Escape Game: Get to Know the Royal Family
Subtitle: Follow clues, solve puzzles, discover new places and learn incredible stories of the city's past and present during this city adventure.

Description: We're rated #1 for nightlife on TripAdvisor in Brighton, Barcelona, and Tokyo and now we're in London. You get: Whether you're new to London or just expanding your social circle, pub crawling is a fantastic way to meet people! Every weekend our crawl is full of lively people who are just there to meet new friends and have a good time. Energetic guides will take you to at least 5 great bars and clubs in Camden. During the night you will get at least 5 free shots, free fast-track entry to every venue, and some fantastic exclusive drinks deals. We even have a big fancy camera on hand to capture all of the good, the bad, and the weird bits that make up a night out On The Rocks. The guides make sure to make everyone feel included, encourage mixing within the group and introduce everyone. This makes it a great activity whether you come alone or with friends. We hope to meet you soon :) INFO: Meet: 19:30, you'll find the guide inside the 'The Camden Eye, 2 Kentish Town Road, London, NW1 9NX, England, England and they'll be wearing a black t-shirt with our logo on it. Days: Every Friday and Saturday Dress Code: No tracksuits (including tracky-bums), flip flops, singlets, shorts, or beach wear. Sorry. BRING ID! 18+ years old only (Sorry, it's the law :/ ) Make sure to bring a valid Driving Licence or Passport, other forms of ID (including photocopies of the above) are unlikely to be accepted by the venues that we visit. Make sure to bring ID no matter your age. **Please note that due to many previous negative experiences we no longer accept Stag and Hen dos on our main crawl; though we do offer private crawls for them. If you'd like to book a Stag or Hen do (or other large group) please visit our website or contact us @ info@ontherocksbarcrawl.com /  +441273013307
Title: London Bar Crawl (Camden)
Subtitle: London's  #1 Pub Crawl/Free Shots/Free Club Entry/Queue Jump/Drink Deals.  Experience Camden Like you Never Have Before- On the Rocks!

Description: LONDON'S TOP-RATED PUB CRAWL IN FAMOUS CAMDEN TOWN! Pub, Bar, Club Mix Join our top rated Camden Pub Crawl in one of the most renowned, eclectic nightlife spots in London: Camden Town. Discover some fantastic pubs and bars as you mix and mingle with a great group of people ready to party all night, and finish in an awesome club - all whilst saving a fortune!  5 REASONS TO CRAWL WITH US! #1 - FREE ENTRY to 5 great bars & clubs in the alternative heart of London's nightlife #2 - Score a FREE SHOT in 4 venues #3 - Exclusive DRINKS DEALS all night long! #4 ‚Äì A PHOTOGRAPHER will capture everything you (might not) want to remember! #5 - Our AWESOME HOSTS will show you way So get stuck in and rock out! Meet our Hosts at our arrival venue, who will explain the night and get you mingled with the rest of the Crawl - your party family for the night! Camden has a great mix of venues, including of course, a couple of more traditional Camden Pubs and then some 'dancey' bars and clubs. Camden really has something for everyone, and we can't wait to show you! INFO WHEN? Arrive between 7.30-8.30pm WHERE? Belushi's Camden (48-50 Camden High Street, London, NW1 0LT) Look out for our friendly guides inside the venue with orange lanyards, or outside with our famous orange umbrella! DON‚ÄôT FORGET ID Physical, valid ID compulsory (Passport, Drivers Licence).  Copies/photos not accepted.

Description: All our weekly life classes classes are drop in ‚Äì no need to book ahead- just arrive and pay cash/ paypal on the door- or you can buy tickets here via Eventbrite (usually you can buy tickets directly from our website - but this is currently being updated- so we have temporarily moved ticket sales here) PayPal link NÔªøEW!: Under 25 / Student discount- Pay ¬£10 for your class! If you are a student or aged under 25 we are offering ¬£10 tickets- we  trust you to buy your tickets accordingly so please be honest about your situation-we appreciate it. There are limited concession tickets for this session To keep up to date with classes, its helpful for us if you register your interest ‚Äì email us at info@londondrawing.com Its so great to welcome you into the studio for our weekly drop in life drawing sessions! WAC is an amazing community hub which has been serving Lambeth and its vulnerable citizans as well as providing free legal advice for the past 50 years-  and our classes help support the charity. As with all our drop in classes- expect professional tutors and models in an inspiring and unique space. With poses from 30 seconds to one hour- there is something for everyone. This is a general life drawing class with tuition for beginners and advice for those who are more experienced, all designed to encourage you to develop your own style and approach. Don‚Äôt come to class if you feel ill- you can rebook to another date- just email info@londondrawing.com We have plenty of room- drop in places available- cash or PayPal on the door- or buy tickets ahead Easels and drawing boards provided Materials available to buy, or bring your own- Paper 20p per sheet, charcoal 25p per stick Saturday Studio 1.30-3.30pm ¬£15  Tickets in advance ‚Äì or cash / PayPal on the door We also run a morning session 11-1pm just down the road at Vaulty Towers Pub And a late afternoon session 4-6pm at WAC Venue: The Waterloo Action Centre 14 Baylis Road SE1 7AA

Description: Come and join me, Silvana, for a truly personal journey into the heart of Italy, right here in my home. Feel the warmth of tradition as I share with you the secrets and the love that I've poured into pasta making, just as it was passed down to me. In these intimate gatherings, it's not just about pasta; it's about a connection to my heritage, to the very essence of Italian cooking. I'll guide you through every step, from selecting the finest ingredients to the gentle art of kneading and shaping, all done by hand, just as my nonna taught me. Together, we'll explore the rich tapestry of pasta shapes and flavours, unlocking the mysteries of centuries-old recipes. As we work side by side, you'll witness the passion and expertise that I've cultivated over years of dedication to my craft. This isn't a commercial venture for me; it's a labour of love, a chance to share the authentic taste of Italy with kindred spirits who appreciate the beauty of tradition. And as we gather around the table, laughter filling the air, you'll experience the true joy of creating something special with your own hands. So come, join me on this culinary adventure. Let's create memories together, one pasta shape at a time. All you need to bring is your curiosity and your appetite; I'll take care of the rest. Buon appetito!!
Title: Artisan Pasta Making Class
Subtitle: You'll learn the centuries old tradition of making pasta entirely by hands, and you will bring the real taste of Italy to your tables

Description: Painting with oils outdoors (Plein Air) in Hyde Park with a small picnic and wine to fuel your creativity. Easels and materials provided. Why not to enjoy a beautiful sunny weather in London and take your creativity outdoors. Join Katerina Kovalova , international artist and art teacher for this wonderful opportunity to paint en Plein Air, in the orchard and gardens of the most iconic and inspirational park in London, Hyde Park . The workshop will begin with Katerina giving a brief talk about outdoor painting, followed by a demonstration of painting in the garden. Participants will then find their own spot to paint autonomously whilst Katerina circulates offering help and advice where required. Working in an intimate part of the park, the aim of this workshop is to produce a series of 'plein air' sketches that simplify the varied and complex views seen. Distilling the subjects through mark-making and colour to capture your experience of the day. Meeting by the Dolphin and a boy fountain for initial briefing, students will then walk to a park where easels and picnic will be set up. Students will produce a series of paintings by the end of the day. These sessions can be attended using whatever medium you choose to work in - e.g. oils, watercolours, pastels, etc. Refunds and options for reschedule will be given in case of bad weather All materials provided
Title: Painting in Hyde park (plein air) with picnic and wine
Subtitle: Painting with oils outdoors (Plein Air) in Hyde Park with a small picnic and wine to fuel your creativity. Easels and materials provided.

Description: We invite you to attend an evening of shamanic healing, plant medicine and live music to heal and grow. We are excited to share three powerful medicines from the Amazon with you - Rap√©, Sananga and  Cacao. There will be adequate time for you to sit with the effects of each medicine while we sing and play to guide you on your journey.  You are welcome to simply listen and enjoy the ceremony or if you would like to join in and sing, play or dance, you are welcome to! The Plant Medicines Preparation You are advised to fast (just water) for at least one hour before the ceremony and avoid any heavily processed or fried foods during the day.  Please wear comfortable clothing. If you would like to bring a guitar, drum, shaker or other instrument to play, please do. Price  The ticket price for this event is on a sliding scale. Please pay what you can afford.  Your Facilitator: Melissa is a renowned Sound Healer, Life Coach, Tantric Practitioner, and Psychedelic Retreat Facilitator. With a passion for empowering individuals, Melissa offers transformative one-on-one coaching sessions and leads workshops and retreats in the areas of Self Healing, Sexual Mastery, and Psychedelics. Melissa's background as a Lawyer brings a unique perspective to her approach. She is grounded and non-dogmatic and empowers her clients to balance their beliefs with a healthy amount of critical thinking and discernment. In her work as a retreat leader, Melissa creates safe and supportive environments for individuals to explore the transformational power of Ayahuasca. With her deep love and respect for shamanic traditions, Melissa guides participants through profound inner experiences, facilitating healing, self-discovery, and personal growth. Her commitment to personal and collective transformation have earned her recognition as a leading figure in her respective fields. Her comprehensive approach, combining ancient wisdom with modern techniques, empowers individuals to transcend their limitations, unlock their potential, and live lives of purpose and fulfilment. Find us on social media: @numinity.collective Join our Whatsapp Group for new event updates.
Title: Shamanic Rap√©, Sananga & Cacao Ceremony
Subtitle: An evening of Shamanic healing, plant medicine and live music to heal and grow.

Refund_Policy: Refunds up to 1 day before event
Description:
The Great Fire of London in 1666 famously started in a bakery on Pudding Lane. Four days later more than 13,000 homes and 87 churches had burned to the ground, along with famous buildings such as St Paul‚Äôs Cathedral and the Royal Exchange. 275 years later, during the Second World War, London sustained heavy bombardment for 7 months, from August 1940 to May 1941, this was the Blitz and its effect was long-lasting. Join your City of London Guide as we explore the streets that witnessed these events.The tour takes around 90 minutes including stopping to look at things along the way.Limited spaces which MUST be booked in advance. Reserve your place now.We try to make our tours as inclusive and accessible as possible Safety:
 The safety of our guests and Guides is paramount and we have limited group numbers to help manage this. 
 All Guides follow the Institute of Tourist Guiding (ITG) Covid-19 Guidance for Tour Guiding. 
 Our walks are outside but you  will in a group with people you don't know and  you are very welcome to wear a face covering
 Please bring your own hand sanitiser. 
 If, on the day, you  have a positive lateral flow test result or feel at all unwell please cancel your place .
Organizer: City of London Guide Lecturers Association
Title: London's Burning
Subtitle: The City transformed by fires

Description: Por favor lee la descripci√≥n completa Please read the full description (For English go bellow) Reservar solamente si estas 100% segur@ de asistir, ya que tu asistencia es muy importante para el formato de este evento. Spanglish ha creado un formato √∫nico e interactivo que te invita a aprender un idioma y hacer amigos mientras te enriqueces con la cultura Spanglish: viajes, deportes, historias, m√∫sica, libros, pel√≠culas, estilo de vida, actividades de ocio, cultura en general etc‚Ä¶ Aprender un nuevo idioma no es solamente aprender su gram√°tica, la cultura en general tambi√©n es muy importante. ¬°Vamos a intercambiar! ¬øC√≥mo funciona? El evento dura dos horas, los participantes hacen parte de una serie de conversaciones que duran en total 40 min: 20min en ingl√©s y despu√©s 20min en espa√±ol. Luego los participantes cambian de mesa (o grupo) y conocen a un nuevo Spanglisher. La idea es que conozcas al menos 3 nativos del lenguaje que estas aprendiendo. Te motivamos a hablar de lo que quieras. Siempre es una buena idea empezar con tu presentaci√≥n y luego cambiar a cualquier tema. T√∫ escoges de lo que quieres hablar, pero si necesitas ayuda, nosotros sugerimos temas por cada sesion. ¬øQue personas vienen a este evento? Profesionales quienes su lengua materna es espa√±ol o ingl√©s (o al menos C1) y estos/as est√°n aprendiendo espa√±ol o ingl√©s (en al menos nivel A2). Si estas en nivel A1, por favor contactamos. tambi√©n tenemos profesores/as calificados/as en ingles y espa√±ol para que aprendas lo b√°sico. ¬øCu√°nto cuesta? ¬£8 Hispan@ y es tu primer evento? Tienes tu primera sesi√≥n Gratis! ¬øDonde? ¬øHora? Queen's Elizabeth Hall Bar Area Southbank Centre, Belvedere Rd, London SE1 8XX De 17:00 a 19:00. Nota: Estaremos en el "Ground Floor" frente al Bar, aunque esto puede cambiar dependiendo la disponibilidad de mesas, asi que busca la bandera o escribenos o llamanos por whatsapp +447870776718. No tenemos un √°rea privada, estaremos en un espacio p√∫blico y habr√° ruido p√∫blico. ENGLISH Please book only if you are 100% sure to attend as your attendance is very important for this event's format. Spanglish has created a unique and interactive format, which invite you to learn a language and make friends while you rich yourself with the Spanglish culture: travels, sports, stories, music, books, films, life style, leisure activities, general culture etc... Learning a new language is not just about its grammar, culture is also very important. Let's exchange! How does it work? The event last two hours, participants take part in a series of 1-to-1 or 1-to-2 or 2-to-1 or 2-to-2 conversations, which last 40 min each: 20min in Spanish, then 20min in English before participants switch table and meet a new Spanglisher. The idea is to meet at least 3 natives from the language you are learning. It is a good idea to start with your introduction and then you can move on to any topic but, if you need help, we suggest topics each session. What Spanglishers come to this event? Professionals who mother tongue are Spanish or English (or at least C1 level), these are learning Spanish or English (at level A2 at least). If you are A1 level, please contact us. We also have qualified native teachers in English and Spanish for you to get the basis. How much does it cost? ¬£8 Payments: https://www.spanglish-lc.com/store IMPORTANT - Your booking is successful only when you pay in advance after confirming your attendance - Limited spaces. Suggestions or Qs Just drop us a WhatsApp, message or email. Our events are advertised on different platforms. For this event we expect around 20 people. Whatsapp, Calls or MSNs +447870776718 Instagram and Facebook as @spanglishlc We have more events and great teachers to enhance your learning, check all our events and teachers.
Title: Spanish/English Language Exchange
Subtitle: Join Spanglish Languages and Culture for our weely and unique Spanish/English language exchange event

Description: Painting in your teacher's art studio with a glass of wine at your side, you'll learn to paint as part of a small group, creating your own masterpiece to take home with you. This class is ideal for beginners so if painting is new to you, don't worry, you'll be in good company! This painting workshop is a focused yet exciting arty adventure, giving you the chance to explore oils, charcoals, pastels and watercolours. All the painting materials you'll need to make your own piece of art will be provided and your teacher will give you lots of support to create something you'll be proud of. Soak up the creative environment, sip on a delicious glass of wine and develop your confidence and skill in painting in a supportive and inspiring space. Your experienced teacher, Katerina is a professional artist and will be with you every step of the way as you paint your way through your workshop. You'll receive all the guidance you need and with small class sizes, you'll have plenty of opportunities to seek tips and feedback.  If you're looking for painting classes to let you connect with your artistic side, or if you're just searching for fun things to do in London with your partner, colleagues or friends, this paint and sip workshop in Wimbledon is a fun and inspiring place to begin. As you work through your painting class, you'll explore your personal style at your own pace, making and correcting mistakes as you go. Your teacher's broad experience enables her to adapt her teaching style to suit your needs and painting style. You'll be supported to paint a still life, using images and inspiration from your teacher, or if you prefer you can bring along some ideas of your own. By the end of this wine and paint class in London, you'll have your own painting to take away with you, to work on further or to hang up in your home! You'll also have a range of new painting knowledge to inspire you to explore this hobby further.
Title: Evening Paint and Sip Class
Subtitle: Get in touch with your creative side, meet like-minded people and step into the art community with this fun and relaxing paint and sip class

Whilst sitting in front of the light, with eyes shut, the users‚Äô mind automatically creates a series of images and perceptions, taking them on their own personal visual journey. Description: Over the past 23 years, BaseballSoftballUK has run the Academy as a programme to develop baseball and softball talent across the United Kingdom, with sessions taking place across the country. As the playing community has grown and evolved, and with the changes over the past couple of years due to COVID-19, so too has the Academy. We believe that consistent coaching throughout the year is the key to unlocking your true baseball potential. Whether you are a beginner or an advanced player, our academy caters to all levels. Embrace the off-season with our expert coaches who will guide you through monthly training sessions, ensuring you stay sharp and ready for the upcoming season. Don‚Äôt let the winter months hinder your progress; join us and keep the baseball spirit alive! Our indoor venues are the perfect setting for honing your skills during the colder months. We currently operate in two indoor locations ‚Äì The 108 in Brent Cross and Alan Higgs Centre in Coventry. No need to worry about weather disruptions or freezing temperatures. Our indoor venues provide a comfortable and controlled environment, so you can focus on perfecting your game without any distractions. Whether you‚Äôre just starting your baseball journey or aiming to take your skills to the next level, our experienced coaches are dedicated to helping you achieve your goals. We believe in personalized guidance, ensuring each player receives the attention they need to flourish. The Baseball Academy is not just about maintaining your abilities; it‚Äôs about growing them! Our structured training programs are designed to address specific areas of improvement, whether it‚Äôs mastering your technique, strengthening your batting, refining your throwing techniques, or enhancing your fielding prowess. Champions are made in the off-season. The Baseball Academy will equip you with the tools, knowledge, and discipline required to make an impact when the season resumes. You‚Äôll be ahead of the game and ready to shine on the field! Don‚Äôt miss out on this exceptional opportunity to be a part of the Baseball Academy. Join now and experience the difference that consistent training can make in your baseball journey. Embrace the winter, embrace the challenge, and emerge stronger than ever with the Baseball Academy!
Title: Baseball Academy
Subtitle: Whether you're just starting out or have been playing for years, the Baseball Academy will get you ready to play in 2024!

Description: This game is perfect for exciting unique team building days out for team bonding & to discover the city! We are rated 5/5 on Google and 4.5/5 on TripAdvisor! Get ready for an exhilarating treasure hunt experience! Can you complete the hunt and find the treasure? The treasure is a great venue at which we will organise food & drink for your party. You can start anywhere you like in The City of London. From Liverpool Street and Brick Lane to the Tower of London, Bank Station and St Pauls Cathedral. All the questions are scattered around this area and the game isn't linear. GAMEPLAY ‚Ä¢ Load the app on your phone one phone per team. ‚Ä¢ Explore your surroundings to find 30 thrilling questions/challenges. ‚Ä¢ Prepare for a mix of environment-related questions, brain teasers, puzzles, and trivia. ‚Ä¢ Each challenge is worth 50 points, but you only have 5 minutes to conquer it. ‚Ä¢ There are some bonus questions each worth double points. ‚Ä¢ Some challenges are tougher than others, so be ready for a real test of your skills. ‚Ä¢ With a time limit of 2 hours, you‚Äôll need to be quick and plan an efficient route to tackle as many questions as possible. ‚Ä¢ At the end you will reveal your treasure - a great venue for your party! ‚Ä¢ If you are playing in teams see your scores on a live leader board and purchase weapons to slow other teams down! HOW TO PLAY ‚Ä¢ Mobile Phones: Make sure each team has a fully charged mobile phone (up to 50% battery usage during the game) and some data. You‚Äôll need an internet connection or data to initially download the game, but subsequent connections will be required only for occasional photo downloads and uploads. ‚Ä¢ Starting: To begin, access the game using the provided link or QR code. Before diving in, carefully read the instructions on how to play. ‚Ä¢ Time: The game is set for 2 hours which starts as soon as you have read the instructions and are prompted to ‚ÄòStart game‚Äô (there is a warning written above this button). ‚Ä¢ Finishing: The game ends if a team either: ‚Ä¢ Completes all the questions. ‚Ä¢ The time runs out. ‚Ä¢ After finishing, you‚Äôll receive directions to the end venue for a well-deserved celebration. Prepare yourselves for an unforgettable adventure filled with challenges, competition, and the thrill of the hunt. Good luck! HOW TO BOOK ‚Ä¢ The time runs out. Choose your number of people (every 4 people make a team, played on 1 phone). ‚Ä¢ The time runs out.After purchase email info@ggtreasurehunts.com to finalise the details of your event, this can be played on any day and there are several options for what venue to end at and what food & drink to have. Good luck!
Title: London, The City Fun Team Building Interactive Treasure Hunt!
Subtitle: Our brand new GPS mobile phone treasure hunt tech has just launched and there's no better team-building experience out there.

Description: Come and spend quality family playtime and engage with your child/children within a safe environment to support their healthy development. A Level 3 qualified Early Years Practitioner will be available to answer your queries. FREE CAR PARKING AVAILABLE Entry information: Your entry includes participation in the Blossoming Babies session and Multi-sensory Experience room. Please arrive by 5 mins before the start of the session so that you and your child get the maximum benefit from attending the session. These activities are for children over 6 months to 5 years old. Children under 6 months are free. One Adult goes free with the child and the ¬£3 is payable for second adult. PLEASE NOTE: While in the centre, your child/children remain your full responsibility at all times. Other information: There is a private Baby Feeding Lounge where you can enjoy a quieter feeding experience with your baby. However, the centre is Breastfeeding Friendly and therefore, you are welcome to breastfeed in any of the public areas. E YPaD Cafe - there is a family-friendly cafe in the centre. You are welcome to buy refreshments and hot/cold drinks to eat in or take away.

Subtitle: A self-directed play session with high quality resources for all children birth to 4 years and their parents/carers.

Description: LoCITY is working to stimulate the supply and uptake of low emission commercial vehicles and improve the infrastructure needed to operate these vehicles. This will make it easier for operators to invest in new technology. LoCITY also supports the introduction of new programmes and initiatives that aim to lower emissions and improve air quality. Course Modules LoCITY Driving is a seven-hour, DVSA approved course that focuses on minimising the environmental impact of heavy goods vehicles (HGVs) by reducing emissions through the use of fuel-efficient driving techniques, cleaner vehicles and alternative fuel technologies. Modules include: ¬∑ Reducing commercial vehicle emissions ¬∑ Using developing technology ¬∑ Considering type of vehicles ¬∑ Reviewing different types of fuels available ¬∑ Impact of commercial vehicles on the environment Who should attend LoCITY Driving? LoCITY Driving is essential training for all HGV commercial drivers and will be applicable to all sectors. The training will raise awareness of the environmental impact of emissions, fuel efficiency, cleaner vehicles and alternative fuel technologies. Commercial drivers have a greater responsibility than other driving licence holders because they are employed to drive. They are required to drive professionally, responsibly and with consideration for the environment and other road users. The course equips drivers with knowledge of: ¬∑ How vehicle checks and maintenance can help reduce emissions ¬∑ Fuel-efficient driving techniques ¬∑ The benefits of journey planning ¬∑ How to use in-vehicle technology to improve driving performance ¬∑ Alternative fuels in commercial vehicle fleetsAir quality and fuel efficiency ¬∑ How vehicle checks and maintenance can help reduce emissions ¬∑ Fuel-efficient driving techniques ¬∑ The benefits of journey planning ¬∑ How to use in-vehicle technology to improve driving performance ¬∑ Alternative fuels in commercial vehicle fleets ¬∑ Air quality and fuel efficiency Background to LoCITY Air pollution presents a major threat to public health, with transport accounting for 63 percent of nitrogen dioxide and 52 percent of Particulate Matter, the two principle pollutants of concern in London. Commercial vehicles represent around one-third of road transport NOx and PM emissions in the capital. The European Union (EU) has set legal limits for concentrations of these pollutants and they apply to the UK as a whole. London is one of several UK cities that are currently in breach of legal limits for NO2. In 2016, air pollution was found to cause the equivalent of 40,000 premature deaths per year across the country. In London, over 440 schools were in areas that exceeded safe air quality levels. It is vital that action is taken to reduce vehicle emissions and improve air quality. TfL is leading the way in reducing the environmental impact of commercial vehicles operating in London. It has worked with operators to develop the industry-led LoCITY programme. LoCITY is a seven-hour, CPC Accredited course.
Title: FORS Professional LoCity Driving Course
Subtitle:
Understand strategies to reduce emissions and improve air quality 
Increase knowledge and awareness of fuel consumption and costs
Understand

Description: Awaken your mind and body to a new level and learn how to practice meditation in motion. The purpose of this yoga lineage is to guide you toward cultivating a conscious connection, integration and awakening of the body, mind, heart and spirit. You will learn and practice Patanjali's 8 limbs of yoga: Work primarily with the Amrit posture sequence, gentle vinyasa flows and extended posture holding times. Explore the deepest levels of body, mind and spirit with the integrative practices of clear intention, breath, meditative awareness and conscious integration. Learn to balance your nervous system with the ‚Äúfirst half‚Äù and ‚Äúsecond half‚Äù of a posture. To transition from an active state of ‚Äúdoing‚Äù a posture, to a relaxed state of ‚Äúbeing‚Äù. And to feel the effects of a posture. Learn to consciously encounter your "edge" of body and mind to release deep tensions and restore the natural flow of the vital life force energy (prana). Good for all levels, from those with some experience to more experienced practitioners. Some experience with yoga and postures is recommended. BIOGRAPHY I have been guiding spiritual seekers for over 30 years with the self-transformative teachings of yoga, meditation, Ayurveda and breathing. It is my pleasure and honor to guide you toward self-empowerment, transformation and awakened consciousness. I will help you connect to your deepest self and inner guide, from the physical to the soul dimension. SOULDIMENSION.ORG Copyright ¬© 2022 ‚Ä¢ Soul Dimension
Title: Awakening Yoga ‚Ä¢ Weekly Class ‚Ä¢ Enfield Town
Subtitle: Weekly online class with a spiritual focus to awaken one‚Äôs consciousness and highest potential.

Description: Wheelie Roller Disco - Loughton- Every Saturday! Get ready to roll into an evening of non-stop fun at the Wheelie Roller Disco in Loughton! Join us every Saturday at Roding Valley High School Sport Centre for an unforgettable evening of roller skating excitement. Whether you're a pro on wheels or a first-timer, this event is perfect for everyone. Lace up your skates and glide across the rink as the DJ spins the latest tunes to keep you grooving all night long. Bring your friends, family, or even come solo - it's all about having a blast and making new memories. With a lively atmosphere and friendly staff, you'll feel right at home as you embrace the joy of roller skating. Don't worry if you don't have your own skates, as we have a wide range of sizes available for hire. So, grab your coolest outfit, put on your favorite pair of socks, and let's roll together at the Wheelie Roller Disco!
Title: Wheelie Roller Disco - Loughton
Subtitle: Get ready to roll at the Wheelie Roller Disco, Loughton - it's gonna be a Wheelie good time!

Description: Clay Day Book directly through our website for a better price! https://www.dalstonclay.com/classes Join us for the second half our signature Clay Day at Dalston Clay! Discover the joyful and therapeutic properties of working with clay and let your creativity flow. This hands-on event is perfect for beginners or anyone looking to try something new. Date: Every Staurday Time: 2:00 PM - 5:30 PM You can also book a clay morning or full clay day Location: Dalston Clay, 10b Bradbury St., N16 8JN CLAY DAY FULL SCHEDULE: 10.00am YOGA A 1hr yoga session to wake up body and mind. Led by a qualified yoga instructor and carefully designed to prepare you for creative flow. A 20 min guided meditation led by Barnaby to help relax the mind so that we are more open to creative ideas. As Barnaby describes "relieving the tension from the attention". During this in-person workshop, you'll get the chance to learn basic pottery techniques, such as hanbuilding (coil,slab, pinch) and even wheel-throwing! Bring your own project ideas or get inspired using our large library. Our experienced, dynamic instructors will tailor the experience to your needs and guide you through the process to achieve your dreams. Especially prepared for Clay Day participants by Almaz at Kaffa Vegan Ethiopian restaurant; just two doors from Dalston Clay. Exceptionally delicious, heart warming and healthy Ethiopian food. A second session for you to continue your ceramics project or start a new one. A guided lying down meditation led by Barnaby. Non-Sleep Deep Rest (NSDR) is a state of deep rest that is distinct from actual sleep. It is a type of restorative rest that allows the body to recuperate and rejuvenate without necessarily entering the sleep state. As we use up a lot of energy in the creative process, NSDR beautifully completes the Flow Cycle Feeling inspired and relaxed! If you would like to keep your piece after you make it, we charge an extra ¬£5-¬£10 per piece depending on the size of each item. They will be ready for pickup in 1 month.
Title: Clay Afternoon: Yoga, Meditation, Pottery, and more!
Subtitle: Discover your flow through a rejuventating day of yoga, pottery and meditation at our peaceful East London Studio.

Description: London has a fantastic craft beer scene with over 130 breweries based in the city. Our Bermondsey beer tour will take in the best breweries and tap rooms of the city's famous 'beer mile'.  Groups of up to 20 will be personally be guided by me to 4 tap rooms enabling the inquisitive traveller to easily engage with my city's craft beer scene.  An accredited Beer Sommelier and Certified Cicerone¬Æ I will give you a tutored beer tasting where you will discover how sensory analysts and beer judges evaluate the qualities and styles characteristics in a glass of beer. You will also come away with knowledge of the beer styles that you are tasting, their history and evolution. This is a step up from a traditional tasting tour and elevates beer tasting experiences to another level.
Title: A craft beer Tasting Tour of the Bermondsey Beer Mile
Subtitle: A tasting tour through the craft breweries and taprooms of Bermondsey's famous beer mile.

Description: Introduction: This course is specifically designed for beginners having no previous experience of clinics but, it is also appropriate for the professional clinicians, who have never participated in the phlebotomy training. Level 3 Certificate in Phlebotomy Endorsed Course by the UK's CPD awarding body Training Step Ahead CPD Qualifications with 40 Endorsed Credits. Phlebotomy Part 1 ‚Äì Theoretical + Practical Session (ultra-modern simulation equipment) Unit 1: Introduction to Phlebotomy Unit 2: Safe Practices This course aims at Infection Control, Health & Safety and Legal Issues in Phlebotomy. Application of Basic Phlebotomy Skills and Techniques This course aims at Infection Control, Health & Safety and Legal Issues in Phlebotomy.This course aims, Infection Control, Health & Safety and Legal Issues in Phlebotomy. Aims of Course: This course aims to learn the introduction to phlebotomy, phlebotomy theory and practice, techniques with its importance. Certification: Upon successful completion, students will receive a Certificate of Attendance from Inspire London. This course aims at Infection Control, Health & Safety and Legal Issues in Phlebotomy. . Note: This is a Part 1 of the Level 3 Certificate in Phlebotomy. To achieve a Certificate in Phlebotomy, the learner must have achieved a minimum of 4 Units with 40 Credits‚Äîprocedures procedures Part 1 & Part 2. Phlebotomy Part 2: Advanced Practical Session ‚Äì Part 2 Fee ‚Äì (¬£350 Normal fee) only Pay ¬£270 In the Advanced Practical Session, you will learn a Phlebotomist role in the pathology department, NHS professional standards, codes of practice, policies and procedures and much more under the supervision of highly qualified & professional trainers. Unit 4: Applying Advanced Phlebotomy Skills and Techniques (Advanced Practical Session) in Clinical Atmosphere (This Unit we will cover in Part 2) Who is this course for? This course is specifically designed for beginners having no previous experience in clinics, but it is also appropriate for professional clinicians who have never participated in phlebotomy training. Through this course, they can recall their previous knowledge and skills to understand the modern contexts of phlebotomy. Career Path After successful completion of this course, the learners can find a number of career paths. Typical career paths that will be available include;
Title: Phlebotomy Training  (Level 3 Certificate in Phlebotomy)
Subtitle: Level 3 Certificate in Phlebotomy (Part 1)Íò°Free Health & Safety CourseÍò°CPD Accredited CertificateÍò°Become a trained Phlebotomist

Description: Time to step into your time-machine and venture with us to the year of 1666. Join us as we explore the events which during a few days in September 1666 left so much destruction, forcing Londoners to rebuild their lives. The City of London was used to fires, but the one that broke out in a bakery in the early hours of Sunday 2nd September 1666 was very different. By the time the fire had died down three-quarters of the city lay in ruins. Hear how the fire started and how it was able to take hold and create so much devastation so quickly. Hear who was blamed for the fire and find out about those who fought to save the city. Navigate the narrow streets of the City of London on this guided walk and hear how the Great Fire of London was the catalyst for modern building restrictions which changed the face of London forever. Hear stories of some of the people affected by this devastating event and how others took advantage of the situation. Discover what it was like to experience your hometown burning, never knowing if you would ever go home. What people have said about our Great Fire of London Walk: ‚ÄúSusan our guide was very informative and the walk extremely interesting . It was a cold day so as the walk is at a slow pace you need to wrap up well. I love these walks around London as even though I live in Earls Court generally i wouldn‚Äôt go wandering around the city etc and signing up to an organised stroll you find out so many things you didn‚Äôt know about the history of London. It really is a great City of the world‚Äù Meryl ‚ÄúThe meeting place was easy to find and our guide, Susan was already there. After we were given our instructions we set off it flowed very well and Susan seemed to know where everyone was. As it was a Sunday the streets in the City were not busy. There were many stops where Susan explained the fire. We had two young boys on our walk who had studied the fire at school and she was very good with them, answering all their questions. It was a long walk which took time and a lot of the information may have been known to the walkers. All in all a good way to spend a couple of hours on a Sunday afternoon.‚Äù Peter ‚ÄúI took my children and they loved the great fire of London talk. They said that they had covered it before but they loved how interested and excited the host was and how much more detail she gave. Also they loved seeing all the places that they were learning about. It was a wonderful walk and we are already looking into the others that you offer!‚Äù Jessica
Organizer: Susan Baker from London Guided Walks
Title: Great Fire of London Walking Tour
Subtitle: Discover the journey of destruction of the Great Fire in 1666.

Description: ‚ÄòDinner and a movie‚Äô is so 2021! Especially when the movie is now played out in the real-world. Let us explain! The route you‚Äôre going to follow in the city is sprinkled with charming and picturesque places, fun clues and challenges, and romantic stories of past and present. The experience will play out like you‚Äôre the main characters of a movie, only that you‚Äôre experiencing everything in first person! Fun dialogue, intrigue, and unexpected interactions are guaranteed. Experience the sights, smells, and sounds of picturesque Bushy Park.  It's all about the beautiful walk as you solve simple clues to find your family & hear fun facts about local inhabitants. An exciting couples, family & buggy-friendly journey to discover a rich cornucopia of beautiful plants & animals. The route starts at the Bushy Park Visitor Centre & finishes by the lovely Pheasantry Cafe, are you ready for a stroll with a difference? HOW IT WORKS‚ùì 1. Book your tickets üé´ 2. Download the Questo app - it's free üì≤ 3. Head to the starting pointüìç WHAT YOU‚ÄôLL DO  The game is an interactive activity where you are guided by a mobile app through the city. With it, you follow directions and solve very fun puzzles, riddles, and cryptic codes. During the game, you will also visit popular and hidden places in the city while learning fun (and we mean it) stories about them. This is a storytelling experience just as much. The people doing these city exploration games gave them an average rating of 4.7/5 around the world. Join the playground too! ------------------ More about Questo üö∂‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Questo is an urban entertainment platform offering thematic real-world exploration games. It is currently available in over 130 cities üåé and has entertained hundreds of thousands of players already. As of today, the app offers more than 300 different experiences created by a growing network of local content creators and event organizers.
Title: Beautiful Bushy Park London: The Missing Game - Outdoor Escape Game
Subtitle: If you‚Äôre looking for a new and exciting way of spending time with your one and only, family or friends, this is your Eureka moment!

Description: Come and Join The Gathering For A Chance To Pause, Slow Down and Lean Into Self Love. This is a Self-Love Practice held monthly brought to you by Sva Yatra that will deepen your connection with yourself and with those around you. This is a safe container created for you to feel free to speak your truth, be present and be vunerable without judgement and a space where you can come each month to learn about self love and build upon the leanings to then create the life you want. You will be within a supportive Community where you will be able to build meaningful connections with like-minded women who are on a similar journey of self-empowerment and self-love. Surrounded by The 5 Elements of Nature: Bells, Incense, Status, Mala Beads and Art, we will sit on cushions around the round Mandala and I will then begin to guide you through the beautiful self love practices. These practices will serve your being that will allow you to shift your energy and expand your inner self, taking your life in newer and more rewarding directions. ü™∂Setting Your Intention for The month ahead ‚Äì We will sit in silence, in Mindfulness and focus on what you want to get out while here in the gathering. This time will allow you to think about what you want to bring about to your inner being & self and to focus on what matters to you ü™∂Inspired Action ‚Äì From feeling your intention, we will together set steps for the month ahead. The idea is that the steps align with what you want to bring into your life, bringing you closer to your desires. You will also pull 3 Oracle cards to guide you ü™∂Reading - Experience a beautiful text of wisdom & teaching ü™∂Affirmations ‚Äì We will write statements that will shift your beliefs for the New month ahead. The affirmations will be based on your goals & dreams and you will be taught just how and when to repeat them so they reach the Universe ü™∂Breathwork ‚Äì Here we will Re-Set and send love to your Nervous System. When focusing on your breath, you get to slow down, be in the present moment and allow yourself to connect to the Universe ‚Äì An important part of manifesting is learning to be still, to let go and surrender ü™∂Forgiveness & Letting Go Practice - Work through Old Patterns & Beliefs that no longer serve you and also holding Bounderies & saying No to people, situations and environments that are not good for you & your higher self. ü™∂Journaling session which includes Checking In with yourself, connecting with your Desires and Celebrating yourself. We will bring our circle to a close with ‚ú®Gratitude and Reflections, any ah-ha moments and inner transformations that you may have, engage in heartfelt conversations about self-care, self-discovery, and personal growth. This is a safe space for you to share your experiences and gain insights from other incredible women. Then, we will close with a beautiful Guided Meditation‚ú®using Tibetan singing bowl & chimes, a drum and other healing instruments and finally a ritual of cleansing the aura with Sage & Palo Santo. This is for anyone who would like to go on a deep journey within and connect to the magic that is the Universe, connecting to a source that is greater than us with the teachings of Buddhism to allow us to be the most beautiful, authentic version of ourselves and stand in our truth, purpose and light. You will leave the circle feeling inspired and with a renewed sense of purpose. You will be feeling a deeper connection with your inner self and know the true meaning of self love, self-awareness an understanding of the connection with the Universe. I look forward to meeting you and holding this sacred space for you to serve you with this beautiful inner work, allowing you to nourish your soul and experience inner expansion.
Title: Buddha & The Universe  | A Circle of Healing, Self Love & Transformation
Subtitle: A Beautiful Circle Created For You To Connect On A Soul Level Nourishing You Spiritually with Sound Healing, Meditation and Self Love

Refund_Policy: Refunds up to 7 days before event
Description: Join us to experience a simple and easy-to-use breath technique that can support you in all areas of your life. In this workshop, you will learn Transformational Breath and receive tips to optimize the power of your breath. The Transformational Breath ¬Æ  session focuses on three main areas ‚Äì increasing physical well-being, improving mental and emotional states, and spiritual expansion. It helps you let go of unhealthy breathing habits, such as shallow breathing, gain a deeper understanding of breath patterns, and release both physical and emotional tension from the body. Experiencing Transformational breath session can help you: AWARD-WINNING THERAPY: The Institute of Complementary and Natural Medicine has announced that Transformational Breath¬Æ UK is the winner of its prestigious 'Best Complementary Medicine Organisation' for 2014. During the breath session, you will not only learn this powerful connected breathing technique but also use sound, movement, and acupressure to facilitate the opening of the breath.  Breathwork has benefits for everyone, and this breathing class is suitable for individuals over the age of 18.  No previous breathwork experience is required.  If you have any medical conditions or concerns please reach out directly to discuss via info@mybreathingpath.co.uk What to expect: No previous breathwork experience required. Mats, pillows and blankets will be provided. Please bring your water bottle. If you haven't experienced Transformational Breath¬Æ before, the ticket of Newcomers to Transformational Breath is for you! If you have previously experienced Transformational Breath¬Æ then you can join us after the introduction part at 12:30 pm to set an intention and breathe. Please consult your medical practitioner to ensure deep breathing techniques are suitable for you. If you suffer from epilepsy, heart problems, phychological conditions such as high anxiety, bipolar, personality disorder this may not suitable and we ask you to contact us via email "info@mybreathingpath.co.uk" first. Join us in Transformational Breath Workshop to elevate your well-being! We eagerly await you participation My Breathing Path- Muge Zorbozan* **Presented in collaboration with Muge Zorbozan and Harika Pekinel during this workshop.
Title: Experience The Power of Breath - Breathwork & Mindfulness Workshop in Kew
Subtitle: Learn how we can consciously change our chemistry, outlook and attitude by changing the depth, rhythm and rate of our breathing.

Refund_Policy: Refunds up to 30 days before event
Description: Best Saturday night out and no hangover! The Sober ReLOVEution! We are super excited to be offering Ecstatic Dances with Live Percussion & Cacao Ceremonies on Saturday nights in 2023! Ecstatic Dance London - Pioneers of Ecstatic Dance in the UK since 2009 You are invited to join us for freestyle, expressive dance & moving meditation sessions. An Evening of Ecstatic Dance with No Alcohol, No Drugs - Just Music, Amazing Rhythms and Cacao! This is a unique sober Saturday night dance in London! No prior experience of dance necessary. All welcome. We also offer limited free crew space, scroll down to find more info and crew sign up form. We've added themes to mix up our Ecstatic Dance offerings! -March 2 SHAMANIC BASS TEMPLE | Mystical | Shamanic |World Dub|Tribal Breaks| Global Bass| -March 9 CATHARSIS | Electronica & Psychedelic Trance| -March 16 *EXCITING SPECIAL EVENT @ MINISTRY OF SOUND 4.45PM-9PM ECSTATIC DISCO: | Funk | Disco | House |* plus Social orYoga, book here. -March 23 no event (we dance on Wed, 20 March at Round Chapel, Hackney) -March 30 no event (we dance on Fri, 29 March in Tufnell Park) -April 6 theme TBC Plus Special Indian Music Concert from Jason Kalidas & Eartha -April 13 no event (We're running Ecstatic Dance Spring Retreat 10-14 April in Dorset) -April 20 no event -April 27 SHAMANIC BASS TEMPLE: | Mystical | Shamanic |World Dub|Tribal Breaks| Global Bass| part of all day event THE RITUAL: Tantric Trance Dance, Conscious Connections, ED ‚Äì to attend all day workshops, book here. -May 4 ECSTATIC DISCO: | Funk | Disco | House | MAY/ JUNE/ JULY THEMES TO BE ANNOUNCED SOON! üíöECSTATIC DANCE SPRING RETREAT, 10-14 April, DORSET:Tickets: https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/773698241267 üß°ECSTATIC DANCE FESTIVAL, 24-28 JULY, DORSETTickets: https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/856917151267 Line up:ecstaticdancefestival.co.uk üíúSEE ALL OUR UPCOMING WELLBEING EVENTS, RETREATS & FESTIVALS: https://ecstaticdancelondon.com/events üíõFREE CREW SPACES: We offer limited free crew spaces at our events. Requirement - you need to have attended at least two of our indoor events before you can join the crew. Please complete the CREW SIGN UP FORM and we'll be in touch. Our Ecstatic Dance sessions have guidelines of: No booze, No Shoes, No phones, No Chit Chat, Move However You Wish, Respect yourself and others. PRACTICE SPECIFICS: Warm-up: stretch, move/dance and reflect on the intention for the dance to a gentle sound wave. The Practice: freestyle dancing to a large sound wave featuring Live DJ set. Some guidance & facilitation will be provided. And then we will let the music, the community and our own inner space direct our steps, our movements, our expression, our journey. Relaxation: Ecstatic Dance usually ends with a deep relaxation. (More info about what is Ecstatic Dance - please scroll further down). No late comers please. This is a shared journey from the beginning to the end and we aim to create a safe container for all dancers. If you are more than 30 min late from the start of the session, unfortunately you won't be able to join the session, please respect this and arrive on time. Thank you ***Please note: this is a zero-tolerance drug and alcohol space! This is one of the very few spaces where Londoners can go out dancing on a Saturday night in London in a safe and clean sober space. Please respect this, and please don't come drunk or high as you will be refused entry or asked to leave. No refunds!*** -Next-level, conscious, inspiring and diverse dance music journey with live percussion ! -A unique conscious clubbing experience! -A beautiful, sacred, heartful, fun & safe space for you to dance freely in -Yummy, velvety tasting raw vegan cacao drink and intention setting ritual -Superb sound system! -Vibrant people who love to dance and love music! -Optional fruit social to nourish you after the dance -Best Saturday night out and no hangover! At Ecstatic Dance London we LOVE chocolate, RAW chocolate-CACAO! We will provide complimentary Raw Vegan Cacao to superfood charge your dance with us! Cacao is the ultimate heart opener, it will give you energy, revitalise your BodyMind inviting you to express, release & unleash your creativity during the dance! Our Raw Vegan Cacao is prepared lovingly by Diana (who makes the best cacao in town for sure!). She uses ethically sourced, highest quality ingredients from Guatemala, directly from a reliable cacao bean farmer. Join us to explore Cacao + Ecstatic Dance as a potent synthesis for Transformation! ‚óà 7pm-7:30pm Doors Open/ Check in / Dance Warm up (No entry after 7:30pm sorry, this is so we can all journey together) ‚óà 7:30pm-9:45pm Cacao Ceremony, Positive Intention Setting/ Ecstatic Dance SoundWave ‚óà 9:45pm-10:15pm Optional fruit social to nourish you after the dance 1. Please come already dressed in comfortable clothing suitable for movement/fitness and dress in layers. Bring a set of dry clothes/small towel as you will probably get sweaty during the session. Toilets are available at the venue but there are no separate changing rooms. 2. We dance barefoot, in soft indoor shoes or grip socks. 3. a Reusable water bottle. Tap water & lemon water refill available at the venue. 4. A healthy snack to have after the dance. 2 minutes walk from Tufnell Park station (Exact venue details will be in your order confirmation email! Please scroll down in the email to see all details!) -Nearest station is Tufnell Park. 2 min walk from the station. Please check tfl.gov for latest travel updates. -If you are driving, please be aware that the venue is in an Ultra Low Emission Zone and you may be liable to pay the daily fee. -Find parking on parkopedia and use venues postcode. There is no parking at the venue. -There are bicycle racks at the venue to lock your bike if you are cycling. -Venue is accessible to wheelchair users. -Toilets are available at the venue. +Eventbrite fee. Book online or pay cash/ card on the door. Low waged/concession ¬£15 (limited availability) Regular ¬£20 Abundance ¬£25 CHILDREN: unfortunately these sessions are not suitable for children. EVENTBRITE ORDER CONFIRMATION: Email might be in the spam folder. Please check the email you used to purchase the ticket, might not be your primary email account. Do not print any paper tickets, we will check you in by your name. We do not offer refunds if you cannot attend; however we can transfer your ticket to another dance if you contact us via email or Eventbrite at least 48h prior to the event. Alternatively, you are welcome to pass on your ticket to a friend, colleague or family member. If you are showing any Covid-19 symptoms, please DO NOT attend the session. If we need to cancel the session due to unforeseen circumstances, we will issue a full refund. If you have any questions, please send us an email to: youareyoubeyou@gmail.com ‚óà Sessions are facilitated and DJed by Seth Newman - the pioneer of Ecstatic Dance in the UK since 2009!  Seth Newman: As the founder of the URUBU School of Transformational Arts and Ecstatic Dance London, he integrates the roots of Humanistic therapies, Bioenergetics & Body Psychotherapy, Transpersonal Psychology and Tantra in creative and life-transforming workshops, retreats and trainings. As a coach, Seth is dedicated to helping people calm, empower and rejuvenate their busy minds and bodies to achieve the best versions of themselves. Seth brings a wealth of experience holding heart-centered spaces. His in-depth studies, trainings,  personal experiences of many therapeutic modalities such as Humanistic & Body Psychotherapy, the Human Potential Movement, 5 Rhythms, Active meditations and the teaching of the Indian Mystic Osho who he grew up with in India in the 1970s,  infuse his approach to living a creative, holistic & embodied life and sharing his unique offerings with others. Seth has been facilitating regular workshops for many years.  As a musician, Seth is very passionate about rhythm & drumming,  has an MA in Community Music from Goldsmith College, worked as a world music percussion teacher in East London schools for almost 20 years, created URUBU collective back in 2009 as a Live Music Ecstatic Dance experience with Afro-Brazilian drummers & musicians and started his journey as an avid DJ with a love for Afro-Beat, Cuban and Brazilian music and created an Ecstatic Dance scene in London and the UK. Seth has a life-long passion for 5 Rhythms and other movement and Ecstatic Dance practices.  URUBU has since evolved into a School of Transformational Arts - offering a variety of powerful  holistic body-mind tools and practices.  MUSIC - MOVEMENT - COMMUNITY! Brought to you by: Ecstatic Dance London - We love to dance. We love music. We love to inspire, to connect, to heal and transform! Ecstatic Dance is a dance/movement practice to explore the exhilarating feeling of moving your body freely. You are invited to move, play, connect, sweat, stretch, sound, unwind, renew, release, improvise, transform. Be true to yourself, while respecting your body, in this space that we co-create together. Move your body, unleash the wild dancing self without caring what people think, claim your freedom, open your heart & touch the infinite! Our Ecstatic Dance classes create a safe and respectful environment that embraces 'all ways'. We offer a movement practice that supports your free expression of emotions and inner space through movement and music. Our intention for these Ecstatic Dance classes is self-exploration, connection, fun, healing, expanding human potential and community building through freestyle ecstatic dance. Enter an open space...and with your bare feet explore the exhilarating feeling of moving your body freely. You are invited to move, play, connect, sweat, stretch, sound, unwind, renew, release, improvise, transform. Be true to yourself, while respecting your body, in this space that we co-create together. PRACTICE SPECIFICS: Warm-up: stretch, move/dance and reflect on the intention for the dance to a gentle sound wave. The Practice: freestyle dancing to a large sound wave featuring Live DJ set. Some guidance & facilitation will be provided. And then we will let the music, the community and our own inner space direct our steps, our movements, our expression, our journey. Relaxation: Ecstatic Dance usually ends with a deep relaxation. No late comers please. This is a shared journey from the beginning to the end and we aim to create a safe container for all dancers. 1. No talking during the dance (if you wish to talk, you are welcome to chat before/after dance outside the main dance space). When we dance without the chitchat, something alchemical can happen on the dancefloor. A unified field of Being emerges and we feel both wild and free, contained within ourselves And connected to something much, much greater than our individual selves. 2. Drug-Free, Smoke-Free, Alcohol-Free environment 3. No photos or videos, Mobile phones muted and out of sight 4. Care/Awareness for the co-created space and each other 5. Move your body however you wish 6. No spectating. Stay connected to your own body, sensations, emotions, and feelings. Ecstatic Dance is about you and your relationship to the Dance. Dancers feel uncomfortable when being spectated at. Come prepared to Dance yourself free from inhibitions! 7. You can dance alone, or with as many partners as (you) like to join. (If you‚Äôd rather not dance with someone, thank them for the offer by placing your hands in prayer position at your heart ‚Äì Namaste. Thank you, no thank you.) 8. This is not a pick up place. Please respect all dancers (especially women) and do not ask for anyone's contact details. If you wish to stay in touch with someone, give them your email instead of asking for their contact details. No means no. INSTAGRAM: @ecstaticdance_london, @urubu_school_of_transformation WEBSITE: ecstaticdancelondon.com EMAIL: youareyoubeyou@gmail.com ECSTATIC DANCE LONDON & URUBU - YOU ARE YOU, BE YOU! üíúSEE ALL OUR UPCOMING WELLBEING EVENTS, RETREATS, FESTIVALS: ecstaticdancelondon.com/events
Organizer: Ecstatic Dance London & URUBU Wellbeing Events
Title: ECSTATIC DANCE LONDON - Ecstatic Saturdays: Wellness Rave & Cacao Ceremony
Subtitle:
Ecstatic Dance, Delicious Cacao, Epic Music! 
No booze, No Shoes, No Chit Chat, Move However You Wish!!
