Description: 6 Hours CPD - The course will cover the following:  ‚Ä¢	Provide an overview of the key risk factors in periodontitis and how this may impact our management in practice, including the perio-systemic links.  ‚Ä¢	To be able to confidently apply the new classification and treatment guidelines in daily practice.  ‚Ä¢	Discuss ways of successfully increasing patient compliance and motivation.  ‚Ä¢	Understand when to refer to a specialist periodontist, what to say to patients and gain an overview of the types of specialist treatments.  ‚Ä¢	Hands-on workshop: hand instrumentation with one-to-one guidance.  ‚Ä¢	Hands-on workshop: Loupes.  HÔªøost Details: Reena Wadia  BDS Hons (Lond) MJDF RCS (Eng) MClinDent (Perio) MPerio RCS (Edin) FHEA, Specialist Periodontist Reena Wadia qualified from Barts and the London School of Medicine and Dentistry with the prestigious Gold Medal in addition to many other notable undergraduate dental awards. Following general practice, Reena was appointed as a Senior House Officer in both Restorative Dentistry and Oral Surgery. In addition to completing the speciality training programme in Periodontology at Guy‚Äôs Hospital, Reena went on to become a specialist associate at King‚Äôs College Hospital. Today Reena is a renowned figure of authority across the global dental industry and is the Principal Periodontist and Founder of RW Perio, the leading clinic for periodontal health located on 75 Harley Street.  Dedicated for acquiring and building new knowledge Reena is well known in her field and in the media for encouraging and supporting other dental professionals by sharing learnings and experiences. To this end, she created her own blog and set up Perio School, a global teaching academy. Reena is a trustee of the Oral & Dental Research Trust (ODRT), which was established to promote the relief of suffering in oral and dental diseases through research and education. She has also been named as co-editor of the ‚ÄòOther Journals in Brief‚Äô section of the British Dental Journal. Reena also has a key role in the European Federation of Periodontology Communications Committee and is an Invisalign Advisory Board Member. Reena is a regular fixture within the media and is regularly seen contributing to publications including Vogue, The Times, Harper‚Äôs Bazaar, Tatler and Forbes.
Title: A Periodontal Masterclass with Dr Reena Wadia
Subtitle: Learn how to manage and treat periodontal disease during this hands on masterclass led by the renowned Reena Wadia

Description: Our Beginners Sewing 1 - Introduction To Using a Sewing Machine class has been developed to address the needs of those who have little or no experience of using a sewing machine. Through this class participants will learn not only basic sewing machine skills, but will develop the confidence to progress onto making things for themselves using a sewing machine. In the afternoon, put your new found skills into practice to create a practical item - project choices are an 'envelope style' cushion or lined tote style bag On completion of this class participants will confidently be able to: - thread a sewing machine and wind a bobbin. - feed fabric through, sew in a straight line and turn corners. - explore the range of features and stitches on the machine. - trouble shoot about common errors and being aware of them! - sew different types of seams. - Understand how to hem the edge of the cloth. - apply a pocket and patches. We also offer a follow on class 'Beginners Sewing 2' - zips, buttonholes & bindings & make your own sewing roll, followed by an afternoon class 'make your own simple & stylish skirt or shorts' A discount is offered when you block book 1 & 2 together! Next date: Saturday 16th March, 11am - 5:30pm. Class Size: 6 students T ime: 11am - 5:30pm (Please arrive promptly) Class Includes: Our own 'Learn to Sew' textile handout (T-Towel) , other materials, use of 'Brother' sewing machines. If you are block booking Beginners 1 & 2, please bring 1:5 - 2m of fabric for the skirt or shorts afternoon activity (nothing too thin, shiny or stretchy!) Please Note: The workshop will take place in the Fabrications studio (which is downstairs from the shop via 12 steps) There is no food or drink allowed in the studio, You are welcome to bring a sealed water bottle but please ensure all 'take outs' are consumed before arriving. For full day classes there is a scheduled lunch break. I f you have pre arranged to bring your own sewing machine, please arrive 1/2 hr before the class starts. Please let us know know if you are unable to attend or are running late by calling Fabrications on 020 7275 8043 Full Booking Terms & Conditions: HERE For more information on Fabrications and our classes visit our Website
Title: Beginners Sewing 1 (Introduction to using a sewing machine)
Subtitle: Build confidence in setting up and using a sewing machine and start your sewing adventure with us!

Description: Join us for a relaxing and rejuvenating day at the Slow Down day retreat + Dinner in London! Take a break from the hustle and bustle of city life and indulge in a day of self-care and tranquility. Located at Wonderful Things, Hoy Street, London our retreat offers a serene environment to unwind and recharge. Your hosts Illiyin Morrison of Mixing Up Motherhood and trauma-informed yoga and mindfulness teacher Lauren Parr are both passionate about creating connection through restful practices and meaningful social interaction, and so we have brought the two together. The day will include slow yin yoga, breath work, delicious food and a place to connect and share, held in the safety and comfort of fellow women.   Soothe your nervous system with a day of rest, relaxation and good vibes; including a restorative movement practice, delicious nutritional food and the chance to leave feeling rested, restored and rejuvenated.  At the end of the day, you  will be treated to a nourishing meal  in the mezzanine dining area, where we will end our day feeling satiated in all the ways.

Description: Shamanic trance dance, drum journey, Hap√© & Blue Lotus Ceremony *Location: Woodford, A few minutes walk from Woodford Station on Central Line Join us for an immersive and empowering event designed for women: During this event, you will have the opportunity to release old energetic blocks, clear your mind and body, naturally (through your breath, movement, and drum theta beats) enter into a state of trance (non-ordinary state of consciousness), delve into the mystical realm of shamanism and connect with your inner power, and Spirit Animals! through the transformative power of movement and rhythm. Led by an experienced shamanic practitioner, this workshop will guide you on a profound journey of self-discovery, soul-connection, and healing. We will begin our journey a sensual and sweet Blue Lotus Tea Ceremony. Blue Lotus, a revered flower with rich historical and cultural significance, offers a plethora of benefits for women seeking a deep sense of relaxation and inner harmony. Known for its calming properties, Blue Lotus has been used for centuries as a natural remedy for stress relief and anxiety reduction. This enchanting flower also holds aphrodisiac qualities, stimulating sensuality and enhancing mood. Embracing the transformative power of Blue Lotus in a serene tea ceremony can be a beautiful and rejuvenating experience. In the shamanic trance dance sessions, you will learn traditional dance movements and methods that have been used for centuries to induce altered states of consciousness. Through rhythmic movements, you will tap into the energy of the earth and the spirit world, allowing yourself to let go and surrender to the flow of the dance. This practice promotes deep healing, emotional release, and spiritual awakening. We will then have a heart-full and powerful Hap√© Ceremony. Hap√© snuff, a sacred indigenous medicine, offers numerous benefits for both mind and body. This traditional and legal (UK) plant medicine, made from powdered high quality tobacco and various healing botanicals, has been used for centuries by indigenous tribes in South America. Hap√© is known to enhance mental clarity, promote relaxation, and provide a grounding experience. Additionally, it can support respiratory health and improve focus. In a sacred hap√© ceremony, where we will gather as a community of women to honor the healing properties of this sacred medicine, connect with our inner wisdom, and create a space of unity and sisterhood. I have been initiated to serve this sacred medicine. Following the Hap√© Ceremony, wehre we have cleared our minds and energetic bodies, we go into shamanic journeying with the drum to recieve the messages and healing of our higher selves and the Spirit world. This ancient technique involves using a repetitive drumbeat to enter a trance-like state and embark on a spiritual journey. With the guidance of our skilled facilitators, you will learn how to access the wisdom and guidance of your spirit allies, discover hidden insights, and receive healing messages from the unseen realms. We will end the event by a grounding our energies into the Earth and a closing sharing circle. Come and join us as we embark on a sacred journey of self-discovery, healing, and Spirit- Soul connection. Open your heart, move your body, and awaken your spirit through the ancient and natural Shamanic practices. The space is limited to 6 women so please book early to avoid disappointment :) About me: My name is Niloufar and I am a psychologist, healer, shamanic practitioner, artist and women‚Äôs circle facilitator. Read more about my training here: https://www.gaiaheartarts.com/training ***Notes: 2. I have a 24 hour cancellation policy for all my events, which means cancellations under 24 hour notice from the start of the event, regardless of circumstances, are non-refundable. Outside of that all cancellations are refundable

Subtitle: An Immersive Organic Trance Event for Women: Learn the Practice of Shamanic Trance Dance & Shamanic Drum  Journeying. Hap√© & Blue Lotus

Description: Go on 15 dates at our popular Saturday night Speed Dating event at the Hoxton Seven in the heart of trendy Shoreditch. This event is for ages 27-39 (age guide) and has an equal ratio of men and women. Expect to meet a lots of single professionals at the best Speed Dating event on Saturday night. Easily one of our most popular events with a great crowd every week. Speed Dating kicks off at 7pm prompt and any guests arriving late may not be able to take part so please ensure you arrive 15-30 minutes before the scheduled start time to allow for registration. When all the guests have arrived the host will explain how the evening will unfold and you will be provided with a scorecard and pen. When the event begins women will be seated and men will rotate between tables every 4 minutes. At the end of each date guests mark on their scorecard or phone using our mobile website whether they would like to see that person again. The event will finish around 8:30pm but guests are welcome to stay and mingle if they wish. The following day we'll contact you with the results and you can communicate with anyone you've matched with through our website. Please be aware that speed dating places are limited and the majority of our events do sell out, so please book early to avoid disappointment. If you have any queries about this event please contact us at enquiries@dateinadash.com or call our telephone bookings hotline on 0845 862 1448 (9am 5pm).

Description: This course will introduce you to Face Painting. It is suitable for those with little or no experience of if you have done some face painting from a book or online tutorials. The course provides product knowledge and general information about product and equipment supplies. The course will give you basic application techniques and design skills. At the end of the day you will leave with the knowledge of how to paint a number of faces Information will be given on how to develop these basic faces and to extend your repertoire. Included in the course prices is a copy of the book "The Face Painters Blueprint" This fabulous user friendly book contains all of the course information plus more, filled with step by steps with clear images and instructions this book takes you through all of the stages of learning to face paint. You will be presented with a certificate at the end of your course. The price of your course includes- 1- Your days training 2- Full kits for you to use during the training day 3- Your copy to take away of the Face Painters Blueprint with all of the course material and lots of step by steps included within 4- Access to our on line training platform, so that you can recap at your own speed everything that you learned on the day! Value ¬£99 5- Four free on line sessions in our brand new Follies Membership for you to see more demonstrations. Meet up with your team, on line, from the day, have access to myself and Eve with post course questions and guidance. Value ¬£54 The course is accredited by The Follies training Academy You will also receive an industry recognised certificate at the end of the training day; this may be used for insurance purposes to gain industry relevant insurance cover. There will also be a small shop on site for you to purchase suitable professional kits and individual items. Training courses may be taken as individual days prices as listed above or may be purchased as group modules which are discounted. The modules give you the opportunity to learn techniques over a period of weeks. Any 3 x courses taken as group training dates shown-¬£330-00 (Not incl body painting) discounting the classes by ¬£60-00 or if you book all three classes at full price we can offer you a professional starter kit value ¬£90-00 We offer one to ones in any of our training modules ¬£295-00 Travel to you to options on training are also provided, prices on application. If you cannot make it to learn with us we offer on line training - https://facepaintingcourses.co.uk/ Check out our web site- https://www.follies.co.uk Link back to all classes- https://www.eventbrite.com/cc/face-painting-and-body-painting-1977499

Description: Meet up to 25 potential matches within the 40 - 55 age bracket at our relaxed and informal event, hosted by www.itsadate.club.  FREE welcome drink included. A sophisticated venue for connecting and socialising, The Refinery Bankside is a short walk from London Bridge & Blackfriars stations. The cosy lounge area plays host to our Saturday night singles party, where guests enjoy a relaxed, informal setting to meet and get to know other singles. The venue combines an open-plan layout with more intimate space seamlessly, providing a variety of options for exploring common ground with new-found connections. Our host will be at the venue ready to welcome you at 19:30. They will be wearing a big smile and easy to spot, but if you‚Äôre uncertain just ask one of the friendly bar team.Your host will indicate the area reserved exclusively for our event, offer you an optional name badge, and direct you to where to leave your jacket. A complimentary drink is offered for guests arriving before 20:00 ‚Äì no better reason to arrive in good time! When comfortable, your host will introduce you to other guests and aid group mingling.Singles parties are more casual and informal in structure ‚Äì a great opportunity to meet and network with other like-minded singles in a relaxed and fun environment. Our host will be there from start to finish to ensure you have the chance to meet everyone and make any special introductions at your request. With up to 50 guests at every single party, there is heaps of time to make new connections, enjoy a couple of drinks, and soak up the atmosphere. After the evening concludes, you can access the event listing in your dashboard to enter feedback on those you have met and await your matches. A match is struck when two guests reciprocate identical feedback; indicating mutual intent to reconnect and enabling messaging via our online platform. If you have any questions on the event or how things will work, please get in contact with James on 07517 065 492 or james@itsadate.club.

Description: Awaken your mind and body to a new level and learn how to practice meditation in motion. The purpose of this yoga lineage is to guide you toward cultivating a conscious connection, integration and awakening of the body, mind, heart and spirit. You will learn and practice Patanjali's 8 limbs of yoga: Work primarily with the Amrit posture sequence, gentle vinyasa flows and extended posture holding times. Explore the deepest levels of body, mind and spirit with the integrative practices of clear intention, breath, meditative awareness and conscious integration. Learn to balance your nervous system with the ‚Äúfirst half‚Äù and ‚Äúsecond half‚Äù of a posture. To transition from an active state of ‚Äúdoing‚Äù a posture, to a relaxed state of ‚Äúbeing‚Äù. And to feel the effects of a posture. Learn to consciously encounter your "edge" of body and mind to release deep tensions and restore the natural flow of the vital life force energy (prana). Good for all levels, from those with some experience to more experienced practitioners. Some experience with yoga and postures is recommended. BIOGRAPHY I have been guiding spiritual seekers for over 30 years with the self-transformative teachings of yoga, meditation, Ayurveda and breathing. It is my pleasure and honor to guide you toward self-empowerment, transformation and awakened consciousness. I will help you connect to your deepest self and inner guide, from the physical to the soul dimension. SOULDIMENSION.ORG Copyright ¬© 2022 ‚Ä¢ Soul Dimension

Description: This is a free session where the ¬£10 cost of the ticket is refunded once you've finished the class. The session takes place at the Heston branch of the Royal British Legion at 79 New Heston Road, Heston Central, Hounslow, Middlesex, TW5 0LG. If you're fed up with having noisy brakes that always need adjusting, or that only have weak stopping power, this class will teach you how to get them working properly. Over the course of two hours, one of our highly experienced mechanics will take you through how to recable brakes, fit new brake blocks, and then get them optimally set up to give you the best braking. PLEASE NOTE: hydraulic rim brakes, disc brakes, roller brakes and hub brakes are not covered in this class. We may be adding classes for those later in 2024. This is a hands-on class, so you'll be carrying out the work yourself on one of our demonstrator bikes as part of a small group, since we find this is a much more effective way of teaching than just watching a mechanic going through the repairs. Tools and gloves will be provided by us, though if you'd prefer to use your own toolkit where possible, that's also fine. If you find that you have Covid, flu or cold symptoms on the date of the class, or have tested positive for Covid, don‚Äôt worry, we can reschedule your booking to another date as the classes take place on a regular basis.
Title: FREE rim brake repair class for people who live, work or study in Hounslow
Subtitle: Hands-on class learning to service cabled rim brakes like V-brakes, dual-pivots, etc. For anyone who lives, works or studies in Hounslow.

Description: For thousands of years human beings have sought ways to reach the source where the greatest consciousness lies so it can be brought down to Earth. In return, this new consciousness becomes humanity's. This course is the 7 stage ladder to reach this place and search this consciousness. This is a life-changing seven day course for those who are serious about raising their perception and reaching their highest potential by working from the other world. You will be taken on a journey to remove a lifetime of generational blocks, so you can make the 'Jump' from this world into the other. The course has been running for the last 20 years and many can testify to the amazing journey it provides. Participants have said they have found nothing like it for making such a profound spiritual step in their life. It is structured around ancient and powerful yet relatively unknown Western energy frameworks. Grahame Martin has evolved these frameworks so each participant can journey into their highest consciousness, removing the blocks on the way, changing their perception forever. The purpose of this system is to reach your highest perceptive point and see how you are connected to all things. We have an innate ability to connect to this highest point, although this is mostly shut down. From this place, truth becomes reality. This is the place where all answers and all solutions can be found. All that we search for in the universe creates our consciousness and will materialise down here on Earth in the form of change. This is how change is created: it is first discovered in the invisible world and by entering into human consciousness it enters our physical world as the new. Course dates: Sat 9th, Sun 10th, Mon 11th & Tues 12th, then Friday 15th, Sat 16th & Sun 17th March 2024. 7 days in total. All participants must be 20 years of age or above. For more information visit: https://highestperception.com.
Title: Highest Perception  - a unique powerful 7 day journey to freedom
Subtitle: For those who are serious about their life's journey. This 7 step program clears what is blocking you from your highest perceptive freedom.

Description: Version control might be an alien concept for many people, but it is indeed at the heart of reproducible research, fundamental in software development and, ultimately, enables a good practice to keep your data organised. It becomes even more relevant when multiple researchers collaborate on a particular project and it is necessary to know who changed what, when they did that, and, potentially, to be able to easily revert those changes. When developing software (e.g., just a small script to process your data, a more serious application for your research team, or a professional-level program), not using some form of version control is just unthinkable. As a continuation of the SRUK/CERU Research Computing Workshop series, we will focus on teaching the basics of the main tool used for version control: Git. In addition, you will learn how to use GitHub, an online repository with which you can collaboratively work on a project while keeping all the benefits of version control. Specifically, this hands-on workshop will cover the following content: Please note that we select our participants on a first come first served basis, so stay tuned to the updates about this even that we will be sharing across our social networks. To avoid disappointment, just submit your application as soon as registration opens so you do not miss the chance to join us! Coffee breaks and lunch are included. Please, indicate if you have any dietary requirements during the registration. This workshop is suitable for beginners, and thus there is no coding skills required. Nevertheless, knowing how to use the terminal to navigate the file system will be helpful. Join this event if you want to‚Ä¶ You will need to bring your own personal computer. The main aim of this workshop is for you to learn how to efficiently use git for version control. In that way, you will need to use the terminal. Consequently, prior to joining the workshop, you must make sure that you can access a terminal on your laptop. Please do one of the following depending on which user you are: If you encounter any technical problems during the installation, please contact the instructors before the workshop takes place (you can find their contact details under the instructors profile, please CC both!). Please bear in mind that we will not be troubleshooting installation problems during the workshop, and thus we require all attendees to have git installed in order to follow the course. We are excited to announce that we are offering a limited number of microgrants to SRUK/CERU membersattending this workshop! For more information, visit the event webpage.
Organizer: Society of Spanish Researchers in the United Kingdom (SRUK/CERU)
Title: Git: Computational Workshop on Version Control
Subtitle: Mastering the tool at the heart of reproducible research

Description: Spice Quest fills a red-hot hole in the London food tour scene: the beautiful burn of fiery food in a group of like-minded people. Together we will take on three of London's tastiest and spiciest restaurants and dishes over five hours. Your foolish tour guide Tom has spent many torturous years tasting and hand-picking these dishes with his masochistic friends. The dishes have been chosen to reflect the diversity of London's cuisines whilst giving your Scoville sensors something to think about! Our 5* reviews say: 'Painfully delicious' 'Seriously fun day with some serious spice' 'A memorable experience and a brilliant day out with great company and food' 'The Spice Quest is like a coming of age, a spirit quest' W hat's included? W hat's expected of you? We try and minimise travel time on the tour but will be walking around for approximately 30 minutes in total between different stops. Please dress appropriately for the weather! Please note that, although we are working on this, we cannot currently cater for any dietary requirements on the tour. Please also be aware that alcohol may be consumed at any of the different restaurants by tour group members. Other than that - see the agenda and FAQs for further information. Oh, and if you're unsure, check out all of our 5* reviews on Tripadvisor! https://www.tripadvisor.com/Attraction_Review-g186338-d25917469-Reviews-Spice_Quest_London-London_England.html We hope to see you for our next SPICE QUEST!
Title: Spice Quest - London's First and Only Spicy Food Tour
Subtitle: Discover London's spicy side with new friends! This is Spice Quest - London's First and Only Spicy Food Tour.

Description: A Workshop to Help Male Leaders Experience Freedom, Fellowship and Flow Break out of confining beliefs, connect to yourself and others, and embody a more successful, purposeful, soulful life. Bottom Line Benefits of Authentic Leadership for a Changing World More effective leadership. Develop research-backed mindsets and skills that match today‚Äôs changing expectations for male leaders. New social connections and friendships. Build bonds with like-minded men seeking better ways of leading and living Deeper authenticity and satisfaction. Find a level of meaning and internal peace that you‚Äôve hungered for at work and at home. Greater alignment of mind, heart, body and soul. Discover the power of integrating your entire being with the universal life force, Qi. Would you like to feel freer? Less stuck and isolated‚Äî The Workshop Authentic Leadership for a Changing World is a day-long workshop to help male leaders discover ‚Äì or rediscover ‚Äì their true voice and evolve to meet this moment. You‚Äôll be invited to break out of confining beliefs, connect to yourself and others, and embody a more grounded approach to leadership and living. Led by veteran facilitators and leadership development experts Kenny Mammarella-D‚ÄôCruz, Ed Frauenheim and Alessandro Ferullo, the workshop will empower you to tap into the deepest parts of yourself. It also will provide practical tools for elevating your leadership and living a fuller, more satisfying life. You will emerge from Authentic Leadership for a Changing World feeling liberated, connected and energised. You will have tools to meet this moment as a conscious male leader and continue your journey with a spring in your step and a twinkle in your eye. You will be on your way toward a more successful, purposeful, soulful life. Key Aspects of the Workshop Freedom: Free your mind. We‚Äôll explore how to update old, confined definitions of manhood that may have limited our effectiveness as leaders in a changing business world. We‚Äôll learn how a ‚Äúliberating masculinity‚Äù frees us to get real, live more expansively, and succeed at work, at home and beyond. Fellowship: Connect with your heart. We‚Äôll build fellowship by telling our stories, learning from others and leaning into brotherhood and community. We‚Äôll become more aware of our core values, speak our truths, and connect deeply with others. We‚Äôll dare to be honest, vulnerable and compassionate in a supportive group atmosphere. Flow: Tap into universal energy. We‚Äôll experience a sense of flow by practising the ancient art of Qigong. Through breathwork and movement, we‚Äôll embody the natural life force ‚Äì Qi ‚Äì that allows us to thrive. We will get a sense of being grounded, supported and inspired. Amid today‚Äôs turmoil, we‚Äôll experience peace. The Facilitators Kenny Mammarella-D‚ÄôCruz is a coach, consultant and best-selling author known as ‚ÄúThe Man Whisperer.‚Äù Kenny founded MenSpeak Men's Groups CIC - a network of men‚Äôs groups that provide a safe and confidential space for men to hang out, be heard, and get real - over two decades ago, serving thousands of men. Kenny has served on the governing council of the ManKind Project UK. He‚Äôs also been featured in media outlets including The Times, The Guardian, the BBC and GQ magazine. He now writes a column in a national newspaper. As a child, Kenny experienced death threats, refugee camps and mental health issues. He later became dependent on extreme sports as distractions from his pain. But Kenny sat with his shadows and unlearned his limiting stories, turning addictive adrenaline into an enlivening endorphin buzz that he now shares with clients. Alessandro Ferullo came to the UK to study when he was 9 years-old, and from an early age, he was always searching for a deeper meaning in life. He has owned his own talent recruiting business, as well worked in the worlds of textiles and publishing. Alessandro always has had an interest in different health modalities and personal growth, and he‚Äôs been involved with the ManKind Project and men‚Äôs work for many years. Allesandro has been studying and teaching the 4,000-year-old energy practice of Qigong for 35 years. Qigong empowers us to take more control of our health and our wellbeing. In 2024 he intends to reach 10 million with Qigong. Alessandro has led Qigong workshops for hundreds of people, with clients including Unilever, ExxonMobil, TTEC and Suez Group. Kenny founded MenSpeak Men's Groups CIC - a network of men‚Äôs groups that provide a safe and confidential space for men to hang out, be heard, and get real - over two decades ago, serving thousands of men. Ed Frauenheim is a writer, speaker and consultant, focusing on masculinity matters, leadership and workplace culture. Ed‚Äôs stories have been featured in USA Today, Harvard Business Review and Fortune. He has co-authored four books. The latest is Reinventing Masculinity: The Liberating Power of Compassion and Connection. It tells the story of how we are evolving from a cramped, unhealthy, outdated masculinity to one that frees men and all around them to live healthier, fuller, more soulful lives. Ed talks openly about wrestling with anxiety, shame and a sense of failure as a man in a hyper-masculine business climate and winner-take-all world. He also shares the peace he‚Äôs found from self-acceptance, mindfulness and community. And he calls on us to rethink our deepest beliefs for a brighter future.
Title: Authentic Leadership for a Changing World --Workshop to Help Male Leaders
Subtitle:
A Workshop to Help Male Leaders Experience Freedom, Fellowship and Flow
Break out of confining beliefs, connect to yourself and others

Description: Get ready to mingle with the Saturday Night Speed Dating for the Over 50's! Join us on Saturday night at Forge bar near Bank for a night of flirty fun. Whether you're looking for a new companion or just want to meet new people, this event is perfect for you! Our speed dating event is specially designed for individuals over 50 who want to find love or make new friends. Expect to go on around 15-20 dates, each lasting a few minutes which is just enough time to know whether you'd like to see that person again. We will provide you with a scorecard and pen and the matches will be sent via e-mail the following day. With limited spots available, don't wait too long to book your ticket! Come prepared to have fun, meet new people, and maybe even find a spark with someone special.

Description: Saturday night Speed Dating in the City at Forge bar for ages 50-65 is the place to be to meet new people. Expect at least 20 dates at this busy event with an equal ratio of men and women. Our friendly host will be on hand throughout to ensure you have a great experience at our Speed Dating event. Forge bar is a stylish City venue located close to bank tube station which means this event is easy to find and travel to. After the event is when the fun begins with a club open until 2am. We've been organising Speed Dating events in London since 2011 so rest assured you're in safe hands. Speed Dating is a great way to meet new people and even if you don't find anyone you're interested in it's a chance to make some new friends and have a fun night out in London. We always ensure our venues are the best in town with a delicious selection of drinks, a post event club and a private room for our event to ensure privacy. Our friendly hosts are the best in the business and make sure you're well looked after. It can be daunting attending one of our events but don't worry our host will be there to meet you and introduce you to other guests. What happens on the night? On arrival at the venue at 7:30pm head downstairs into the club room where this event will be taking place. Our host will check you in and invite you to get a drink at the bar. Once everyone has arrived there will be a brief introduction about how the event works and then the action begins! Ladies will be seated and the men will move around every 4 minutes. After each date you have the chance to mark on your dating card whether you'd like to see that person again or log your selections on our mobile website. The following day we will publish the matches at 12pm but don't panic if you don't find a match because we have a '100% No Match' guarantee which means you can attend your next event for FREE if you're unsuccessful. What type of people attend this event? Our city events tend to attract professionals who work in the area such as bankers, finance or media backgrounds. It's a young and vibrant crowd who like to work hard and let their hair down at the end of the week. Sociable and fun with a great mix of personalities' and ethnicities. Why choose DateinaDash? There are lots of organisers who arrange Speed Dating events in London. Be aware that most of these events are organised by 'fly by night' operators who have not been in the business for very long. Since we have been established for over 10 years and with more than 5,000 events under our belt we know what we're doing. Not only have we been featured on several TV shows, we also won the award for the 'Best Speed Dating company' at the UK Dating Awards (a claim no other company can say) with hundreds of positive reviews online and more people attending our events each week than anyone else it's no wonder why we're the market leader for Speed Dating London. Some of the other events you see on Eventbrite generally have poor turnouts with uneven ratios of men and women, unorganized hosts and poor venues. We suggest you always check who the organizer is and if they have a proper website and where that website ranks in Google for 'speed dating London' keyword. If you can only see a paid advert then chances are they are not well established and worth avoiding. What's included? Tickets for this event are ¬£20 and can be booked through this website or DateinaDash. If you have any questions please get in touch! We look forward to seeing you at one of our events very soon.
Organizer: DateinaDash: Speed Dating London & Singles Parties
Title: Saturday Night Speed Dating in London @ Forge Bar (Ages 50-65)
Subtitle: 20 dates at this popular Saturday night Speed Dating event in the City of London at the stylish Forge bar for ages 50-65. Tickets ¬£20.

Description: An evening of fast, fun & flirty speed dating for ages 30-45 (age guide) within the stylish surroundings of El Vino Wine Bar near London Bridge. Expect to meet around 20 people at this popular event in town. The crowd is always well dressed & ready to let their hair down. Speed Dating kicks off at 8pm prompt and any guests arriving late may not be able to take part so please ensure you arrive 15-30 minutes before the scheduled start time to allow for registration. On arrival at the venue one of our friendly hosts will be waiting to register you.  When everyone has arrived the host will explain how the evening will unfold and you will be provided with a scorecard, name badge and pen. When the event begins women will be seated and men will rotate between tables every 4-5 minutes. At the end of each date guests mark on their scorecard or mobile phone whether they would like to see that person again.  There will be a 15 minute break half way through to allow for refreshments.  The event will finish at around 9:30pm but guests are welcome to stay afterwards. If you have used your mobile phone to enter your preferences then you will be able to view your matches instantly at the end of the event. Otherwise please take home your scorecard and upload your matches before 12pm on the following day.   Please be aware that tickets for our events are very limited and the majority do get booked up in advance, so please book early to avoid disappointment.    If you have any queries about this event please contact us or call our telephone bookings hotline on 0845 862 1448 (9am-5pm).
Title: London Speed Dating @ El Vino (Ages 30-45)
Subtitle: Go Speed Dating with DateinaDash on Saturday night at El Vino and meet 15-20 new people in one fun night. Tickets only ¬£20!

Description: !! CORRECTION !!  SOME PUBLICITY HAS THE WRONG DATES FOR THE UNDERCOVER SKANKDOWN WEEKEND  THE CORRECT DATES ARE FRIDAY 8TH MARCH: POPES OF CHILLITOWN + ROSHAMBO + BALD HEAD AND THE DREADS - (NOT THE 9TH) SATURDAY 9TH MARCH: RADICAL DANCE FACTION + EASTFIELD + DOG ROTTEN - (NOT THE 8TH) APOLOGIES FOR ANY CONFUSION + EASTFIELD + Support to be announced See ya down the front or at the bar. Details to follow Wont last long TICKETS ARE ¬£12 IN ADVANCE OR ¬£15 ON THE DOOR ALSO we are doing a joint ticket for this gig and the Popes Of Chillitown gig the day before for ¬£20 in advance. Radical Dance Faction Berkshire collective R.D.F, founded by Chris Bowsher, combine punk, dub, and ska, while Bowsher's lyrics, spoken rather than sung, deal mainly with political issues. They were a regular act on the UK free festival scene prior to the 1994 Criminal Justice Act, and were part of the crusties and anarcho punk movement. After a split in the mid 90s, they reformed in 2006 and continue to play today!  We love em at Undercover, and if you have not seen them yet you are in for a treat. EASTFIELD The midlands finest sons and daughter Eastfield back after smashing it last year and the several other times they have played for us at Undercover. DOG ROTTEN Played for us a few times and they never fail to disappoint!
Title: RADICAL DANCE FACTION + EASTFIELD + Support back in Guildford
Subtitle: RADICAL DANCE FACTION (RDF) + EASTFIELD support back in Guildford for their 3rd annual skankdown

Description: Join Monica and Alison, The Berkshire Sound Therapists, for an evening of reiki healing. Reiki is a powerful and gentle energy that connects us back to our body and self-healing abilities. It works on a deep level to bring about relaxation, peace, and healing. After inviting the reiki energy in with a reiki meditation, the evening will move into gentle and intuitive mat-based movement, chanting, and self healing practices, before ending with a reiki drum journey. Our intention is not only to provide a space for healing, but to give you some tools which you can take home with you. W HAT YOU WILL NEED: ÔÇ© Yoga mat, cushion, blanket and anything else you may need to be comfortable ÔÇ© Reusable water bottle and a journal if you'd like to take notes VENUE INFORMATION: Forest Park Community Centre. There is parking here. The nearest train station is Martins Heron which is a 15 minute walk. COST: ÔÇ© ¬£33 ÔÇ© We have set a donation option to reduce your ticket fee cost. Please enter the listed amount to purchase your ticket. Thank you in advance! Any tickets booked below the indicated donation amount will be refunded immediately. 1 ticket per transaction please. CANCELLATIONS: No refunds, however, you may nominate another person to attend in your place if you are unable to. EVENTBRITE ORDER CONFIRMATION: Your email confirmation might go into your spam folder. Please check. Full refunds will be issues if for any reason the class has to be cancelled. ABOUT THE BERKSHIRE SOUND THERAPISTS: Alison from Just BE Sound and Movement Therapy: Just BE Sound and Movement Therapy is run by Alison Heaslewood who qualified in Sound and Movement Therapy with the British Academy of Sound Therapy. Following a five year episode of chronic pain in her twenties and a diagnosis of fibromyalgia, she turned to alternative methods of healing, including Sound Therapy. Along with sound, movement was instrumental in her full recovery and as well as offering sound journeys, she holds separate sessions to weave sound and movement together. With five years vocal training she enjoys bringing soothing vocals into her sound sessions along with other percussion. She creates nurturing and relaxing spaces for anyone seeking a space to Just BE. Monica from Luna Sound and Energy:Monica is a Gong Master Practitioner and Usui & Karuna Reiki Master. She‚Äôs also qualified in Reiki drumming, Tibetan and Crystal singing bowls and Aura & Chakra balancing. She‚Äôs passionate about sharing the sound and loves mixing sonic practices with energy therapies. She believes sound is transformative and can help with anxiety, insomnia and depression amongst other things. CONNECT WITH US:ÔÇ© Alison:www.instagram.com/soundandmovementtherapyTo read reviews: www.facebook.com/JustBEsoundandmovementtherapyÔÇ© Monica:www.lunasoundandenergy.co.uk

Description: Awaken your mind and body to a new level and learn how to practice meditation in motion. The purpose of this yoga lineage is to guide you toward cultivating a conscious connection, integration and awakening of the body, mind, heart and spirit. You will learn and practice Patanjali's 8 limbs of yoga: Work primarily with the Amrit posture sequence, gentle vinyasa flows and extended posture holding times. Explore the deepest levels of body, mind and spirit with the integrative practices of clear intention, breath, meditative awareness and conscious integration. Learn to balance your nervous system with the ‚Äúfirst half‚Äù and ‚Äúsecond half‚Äù of a posture. To transition from an active state of ‚Äúdoing‚Äù a posture, to a relaxed state of ‚Äúbeing‚Äù. And to feel the effects of a posture. Learn to consciously encounter your "edge" of body and mind to release deep tensions and restore the natural flow of the vital life force energy (prana). Good for all levels, from those with some experience to more experienced practitioners. Some experience with yoga and postures is recommended. BIOGRAPHY I have been guiding spiritual seekers for over 30 years with the self-transformative teachings of yoga, meditation, Ayurveda and breathing. It is my pleasure and honor to guide you toward self-empowerment, transformation and awakened consciousness. I will help you connect to your deepest self and inner guide, from the physical to the soul dimension. SOULDIMENSION.ORG Copyright ¬© 2022 ‚Ä¢ Soul Dimension
Title: Awakening Yoga ‚Ä¢ Weekly Class ‚Ä¢ Woking
Subtitle: Weekly online class with a spiritual focus to awaken one‚Äôs consciousness and highest potential.

Description: Join us for a tour of Brookwood Military Cemetery, the largest Commonwealth War Graves Commission (CWGC) site in the United Kingdom, covering approximately 37 acres.  Brookwood Military Cemetery is the final resting place of over 8500 Commonwealth servicemen and women. Over 5000 of these In addition to the Commonwealth plots, the cemetery also contains Belgian, Czechoslovakian, French,  Italian and Polish sections, and a number of war graves of other nationalities all cared for by the CWGC. To mark International Women's Day, join us for a tour to learn more about the women commemorated in the cemetery. These stories include women who served in the Auxiliary Transport Service, Medical Corps, Voluntary Aid Detachment and Special Operations Executive. Please come dressed for the weather and in a suitable walking shoe. The tour lasts approx. 90 minutes and involves walking on grass. MEETING POINT: Canada Building. This is the building just beyond the gates as you enter from Dawney Hill.  Brookwood Military Cemetery can only be accessed by vehicle via the entrance off Dawney Hill.  There is a direct train service from Waterloo to Brookwood Station from which there is an entrance to the cemetery. You will need to allow 10-15 minutes to walk from the station to the meeting point.  CWGC Brookwood Military Cemetery is not to be confused with Brookwood Cemetery. Google Maps provides the most accurate directions to the site.
Title: CWGC International Women's Day Tours - Brookwood Military Cemetery
Subtitle: For International Women's Day 2024, join us for a guided tour of the females commemorated at Brookwood Military Cemetery.

This ancient elixir offers: - Gently energizing and calming properties - Enhanced spiritual experiences - Relaxation due to its magnesium content - Improved blood flow to the heart and brain - Antioxidants to balance blood sugar levels Benefits of Conscious Connected Breathwork: Engaging in Conscious Connected Breathwork during the workshop offers various transformative benefits such as: - Releasing suppressed emotions and trauma from the subconscious - Facilitating deep healing and inner transformation - Expanding consciousness and fostering spiritual growth - Enhancing self-awareness and mindfulness - Promoting a sense of liberation and empowerment Benefits of Holy Fire Reiki and Shamanic Healing: Participating in Holy Fire Reiki and Shamanic Healing during the workshop can lead to: - Clearing energy blockages and promoting flow - Releasing negative emotions and promoting emotional well-being - Balancing chakras and harmonising energy centers- Increasing vitality, resilience, and overall well-being - Facilitating self-discovery and inner transformation Benefits of Sound Healing: Immersing yourself in the transformative Sound Healing sessions can result in: - Balancing energy frequencies within the body - Facilitating a meditative state and deep relaxation - Promoting a sense of peace and tranquility - Clearing energetic imbalances and promoting harmony - Enhancing spiritual connection and inner alignment Workshop Options: Attend one of the 3-hour workshops in the morning or afternoon, or both for a discounted rate. Preparation Info: To fully benefit from the workshops, ensure: - Eat lightly on the day with the last meal approximately 1.5 hours before the workshop. - Avoid caffeine and alcohol before the event Contraindications: Please note contraindications: - Anti-depressants (cacao boosts serotonin levels) - Pregnancy (due to caffeine content) - High/Low blood pressure or Heart disease Additional Items to Bring: - Pillows and a blanket for comfort during the lying down portions of the workshop. - A journal and pen for reflective purposes or jotting down insights. - Water and light snacks for after the breathwork session.-  Any crystals you would like to have charged with Holy Fire Reiki energy. Directions and Parking: If you are traveling by train, the closest station is Watford Station on the Metropolitan line. No on-site parking available. Connect with Practitioners: Follow Chanel at @bodhiandbreath,  TJ at @pt2pt.uk,  Indy at @_simplyheal,  Rash at @rashbajwa Prepare for a profound experience of self-discovery and inner transformation through the various modalities offered at the event. Description: Note the word Attraction, includes the word ACTION! And here's the difference between a Vision and an Attraction Board. During this workshop you'll take time for yourself to: Creating an Attraction Board is more than pasting pictures to a board. It's a way of selling it to yourself, anchor to your dreams and allow the magic of manifestation to work in your life.  For instance, when I created my Attraction Board , I included a new car, spa days and a lovely diamond ring and all these things have come true. Driving my new car I realised I‚Äôm noticing my make of car everywhere I go. That‚Äôs because it‚Äôs been brought into my consciousness. Attraction Boards are so powerful. Once you get clarity, you select images and words from magazines and paste them on a poster board. Seeing this board each day aligns your brain with the outcomes you most want to attract. It sounds pretty simple. And yes, there is a process to make your Attraction Board more powerful. So, why doesn‚Äôt everyone create Attraction Boards?  Well, in my experience as a Coach and Trainer most of us never make the time. We let our busy, distracted lives keep us, well; busy and distracted. It‚Äôs time to change that. Would you like to see how an Attraction Board will change your life?¬†  A full-day immersion for you to concentrate and maintain focus on your authentic life; in a safe environment with like minded people and have FUN!¬† Due to the deep nature of the work, there are only 6 places available. You'll gain: So, what's stopping you joining me? SIGN UP! Have question?  Contact me on 07827 932138 or email vibe@corrcoaching.com I'd love to hear from you! Madeline
Title: Attraction Board Workshop
Subtitle: Take Your Vision Board  A Step Further! Create a Attraction board, to take ACTION and get what you want!

Description: Join us for an unforgettable Saturday night at our popular Speed Dating event, located in the heart of trendy Shoreditch at the Lighthouse. This event is perfect for singles aged 27-39 (age guide) and offers an equal ratio of men and women. Expect to meet a diverse group of single professionals at one of the best Speed Dating events in town. With a fantastic crowd every week, this event is easily one of our most popular. The event commences promptly at 7pm, so please arrive 15-30 minutes before the scheduled start time to register. Latecomers may not be able to participate. Once all the guests have arrived, our host will explain the evening's format, and you will receive a scorecard and pen. The event begins with women seated, and men rotating between tables every 4 minutes. At the end of each date, guests indicate on their scorecard or via our mobile website whether they wish to see that person again. The event typically ends around 8:30 pm, but guests are welcome to stay and mingle if they wish. The following day, we'll notify you of your matches via our website, where you can communicate with anyone you've matched with. All our events sell out in advance so please book early to avoid disappointment. For any questions please drop us an e-mail to enquiries@dateinadash.com.
Title: Saturday Night Speed Dating in Shoreditch (Ages 27-39)
Subtitle: London's best Speed Dating event on a Saturday night for singles aged 27-39! Meet 15-20 people with DateinaDash at the Lighthouse.

Description: Welcome to our new Vinyasa Flow Yoga class in Greenwich, London! In this invigorating and dynamic practice, we focus on harmonizing breath and movement to create a seamless flow of poses. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced yogi, this class is designed to challenge and inspire you on your yoga journey. The class begins with a centring and grounding moment, allowing you to leave behind the outside world and bring your focus inward. We'll start connecting with our breath, setting a steady rhythm that will guide us throughout the practice. As we move through the class, you can expect a creative sequence of postures that transition smoothly from one to the next. Vinyasa Flow is all about continuous movement, syncing each breath with a specific movement or pose. This flow not only helps build strength and flexibility but also encourages a sense of meditation in motion. Our skilled and compassionate instructors will guide you through a variety of asanas (poses), ensuring proper alignment and offering modifications to suit individual needs. You'll explore a diverse range of standing poses, balances, backbends, inversions, and gentle stretches to target different muscle groups and promote overall body awareness. Towards the end of the class, we'll gradually wind down with calming postures and gentle stretches, preparing both body and mind for the final relaxation, Savasana. This restful and meditative pose allows you to integrate the benefits of the practice, leaving you feeling rejuvenated, balanced, and at peace. Our Vinyasa Flow Yoga class is not just a physical workout; it's an opportunity to explore mindfulness, gain mental clarity, and tap into the present moment. So, whether you seek stress relief, improved flexibility, or simply a chance to unwind, join us on the mat and experience the transformative power of Vinyasa Flow Yoga. All levels are welcome, and we look forward to sharing this journey with you! The studio has all necessary equipment. Team Yogalicious
Title: Yoga with Yogalucious Greenwich
Subtitle: Yogalicious has started a new vinyasa yoga class in Greenwich, London. This class is taught by different teachers each week.

Description: Do you spend your time playing with Ouija boards and watching spooky videos indoors? Yawn. Newsflash: your twenty-year-old house is about as haunted as YouTube ‚Äì MySpace at a push. The present (and past) is outside, in real life, where all the creepy buildings, monuments and verifiable ghost sightings hotspots are. With this in mind, we‚Äôre inviting you to visit places that are truly haunted. Let that sink in for a moment. The route you will follow is full of haunted and spooky places, mysterious clues and challenges, and real facts/accounts from the past and present. The experience will play out like you‚Äôre the main characters of a movie, only that you‚Äôre experiencing everything in the first person! Fun dialogue, intrigue, and unexpected interactions are guaranteed. Embark on a city exploration game in London that will take you through the slashing grounds of the most infamous serial killer in history. With every step you take, you will get closer to solving a mystery that has baffled the world for more than a century: who was Jack the Ripper? Follow clues and solve puzzles to put the pieces together... Are you ready to step into the dark alleys and uncover their sinister secrets? Let's play a real-world adventure! In 1888, a series of horrendous events shook the city of London. 5 murders were committed, unsolved by the London Metropolitan Police, all the work of Jack the Ripper ‚Äì an unidentified serial killer who terrorized the streets of London but left behind no clues. For more than 130 years, his identity has remained a mystery. You are an investigator reopening the Ripper files. Can you shed new light on the case? Or will you also get lost on the murderer‚Äôs trail of darkness? Full flexibility: start at any hour, take a break at any time and resume later This is always available. It's 24/7, every day of the week. This is the safest event you can book: private, no human contact, you will avoid crowds. Play offline: you DON'T NEED an internet connection to play this city game. HOW IT WORKS‚ùì 1. Book your tickets üé´ 2. Download the Questo app - it's free üì≤ 3. Head to the starting pointüìç WHAT YOU‚ÄôLL DO The game is an interactive activity where you are guided by a mobile app through the city. With it, you follow directions and solve very fun puzzles, riddles, and cryptic codes. During the game, you will also visit popular and hidden places in the city while learning fun (and we mean it) stories about them. This is a storytelling experience just as much. The people doing these city exploration games gave them an average rating of 4.7/5 around the world. Join the playground too! ------------------ More about Questo üö∂‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Questo is an urban entertainment platform offering thematic real-world exploration games. Description: Blended Level 3 Award in Paediatric First Aid RQF  This course is designed for childminders, carers, nursery and primary school workers. This course meets the criteria set out by Ofsted for the Early Years Foundation Stage standards. Every delegate will be entitled to a FREE 2 hour training session every year for the duration of their valid certificate! (Terms and Conditions apply) This is course is a blended course. That means that 6 hours is completed at a time that suits you. (The online portal will be live 14 days before your course start date)  You will then join us for a 6 hour training day face to face from 9:30am - 5pm Portal details will be emailed to you 14 days before your course date.  Date of Face to face training:  Saturday 9th March 2024 Delegates will cover a range of topics including: * Planning and dealing with emergencies * Child and infant cardiopulmonary resuscitation * Child and infant choking procedures * Secondary assessment & Recovery position * Treatment for bleeding and shock * Treatment for broken bones and head, neck and back injuries * Treatment for burns and scalds and electric shock * Poisoning, bites and stings * Eye injuries, and foreign bodies in eyes, ears and nose * Effects of heat and cold and febrile convulsions * Allergies and anaphylactic shock * Asthma, seizures and diabetes * Childhood illnesses ***ONLY ¬£100 **** To book visit www.keepabeat.com/hertfordshire or call 07983 853448 100% Attendance is needed for certification Please check our recommendations for great feedback over the last few months. Have a question? Give us a call on 07983 853448
Title: Blended Level 3 Award in Paediatric First Aid RQF
Subtitle: Fully regulated Blended Level 3 Aware in Paediatric First Aid RQF. Suitable for childmnders, carers, nursery and primary school workers

Description: Why throw it away when it can be brought back to life with just a little help!? Learn new skills, meet new people and create the habit of repairing and reusing things. When: Every second Saturday of the month between 10am - 3pm. Where: Eco Action Hub at the Nicholson's Centre, just opposite New York Deli cafe. Important: Our events are open to all and free to attend. However, we have had repeated instances of people booking a ticket,not showing up and not letting us know that they will not be coming, so we can allow others to participate. For this reason we are now trialling a donation-based booking with Eventbrite. So if you wish to pre-book your ticket click ‚ÄòRegister‚Äô, and choose a dedicated time slot. This would be subject to a small donation (min. ¬£1).  If you are on benefits and/or experience any issues booking  please e-mail us at repair.maidenhead@gmail.com Typical repair skills include, amongst others: One ticket per item to be repaired. We ask that you bring one item per event to give everyone the opportunity to get it looked at. We aim to fix anything as our volunteers love to solve problems! Check out our Facebook and Instagram pages to find out what we have been fixing. One ticket per item to be repaired. We ask that you bring one item per event to give everyone the opportunity to get it looked at. Tickets will be available until 1pm on the last Thursday prior to the event. Description: Book your ticket (1 ticket = 1 car, not 1 person) to visit our horses, ponies and donkeys and say hello to them in the stables and the surrounding fields. If you are a Gold Sponsor or Season Pass holder you do not need to pre-book a car park space. Please provide your proof of Horse Trust pass at entry. The Horse Trust is nestled in the beautiful Chiltern countryside between High Wycombe and Aylesbury in Buckinghamshire. It is here that we care for up to 140 retired and rescued horses, ponies and donkeys. On your visit you can meet some of our residents, stroke them and read their interesting back stories. Our horses are from a variety of backgrounds - the police, military, Royal Mews, Riding for the Disabled Association and heart-wrenching rescue cases. You can enjoy hot drinks, delicious cakes and even a cream tea in our Black Beauty Tea Room. We also have a small museum on the yard where you can learn about our history. All non Gold Sponsor visitors are required to pre-book tickets prior to arrival (unless you have a season pass in which case you don't need to book and won‚Äôt pay an entry fee). We are open Thursdays - Sundays (Wednesdays during school holidays) from 1-4pm. Gates will be closed for entry at 3.40pm. Unfortunately we cannot issue any refunds for cancellations. Bookings are only transferable at our discretion to an alternative date if you contact The Horse Trust directly at info@horsetrust.org.uk at least 48 hours before the date you originally booked to visit. We cannot guarantee that we can change the date of your visit; however, we will make all reasonable efforts on a case by case basis. If you cannot attend, your booking fee will go as a charitable donation towards the horses, ponies and donkeys in our care. Should you have any queries you can contact us on 01494 488464 during office hours Monday-Friday 08.30 - 16.30 or email info@horsetrust.org.uk. Thank you so much for supporting The Horse Trust. We look forward to your visit!
Title: The Horse Trust Entrance Tickets 2024
Subtitle: Visit our horses, ponies and donkeys at our sanctuary nestled in the beautiful Chiltern countryside.

Description: FORS Safe Urban Driving Course The FORS Safe Driving Course focuses on vulnerable road users such as pedestrians, cyclist's and motorcycles, but has a focus on cyclists. The course includes a practical 'on-road' cycle training element and gives drivers a 'real life' experience as to the cyclist's perspective of riding on London's roads, as well as in traffic. The training also counts towards the 35 hours DCPC that professional drivers need to complete by every 5 years to retain their Driver Qualification Card. The course consists of two 3.5 hour modules (both delivered the same day) with the first module being a classroom-based theory, and the second module, a practical on-cycle session where drivers get a vulnerable road user's view of the road. Theory Module (3.5 hours) This part of the course focuses on sharing the road safely and highlights the vulnerability of other road users. It also explains how the London streetscape is evolving to encourage more walking and cycling. Subjects covered include Practical Module (3.5 hours) After the initial bicycle control skills training, drivers ride on bikes to areas of potential conflict including junctions, traffic lights and Advanced Stop Lines. Subjects covered include:- Please note: Lunch and travel costs are not included unless arranged with the centre in advance but tea, coffee and light refreshments at all breaks will be provided. IMPORTANT: All Drivers attending must provide an acceptable form of proof of identity in terms of the following:- The requirement to provide an acceptable form of identification must be met to allow Us to register the driver onto both the TfL's 'FORS Trained Driver' database and the DVSA's Driver CPC register to confirm attendance with both organisations. In order for a driver to be uploaded to the FORS/TfL register and/or be accredited with the Driver CPC hours they must complete the entire course. Drivers will only be excused from taking part in the cycle element where a significant medical or psychological issue would risk harm to them or other road users, or if during the cycle familiarisation session, the driver is risk assessed as not safe to ride a bike on public roads - in these instances it is acceptable for the drivers to walk the course meeting up with the cyclists at the exercise/discussion points and joining in with the discussion. All bookings are subject to our Cancellation Policy and by registering for a course you are agreeing to its terms.
Title: FORS Safe Driving - Chelmsford i
Subtitle: FORS and Driver CPC approved Training  Chelmsford

Description: Awaken your mind and body to a new level and learn how to practice meditation in motion. The purpose of this yoga lineage is to guide you toward cultivating a conscious connection, integration and awakening of the body, mind, heart and spirit. You will learn and practice Patanjali's 8 limbs of yoga: Work primarily with the Amrit posture sequence, gentle vinyasa flows and extended posture holding times. Explore the deepest levels of body, mind and spirit with the integrative practices of clear intention, breath, meditative awareness and conscious integration. Learn to balance your nervous system with the ‚Äúfirst half‚Äù and ‚Äúsecond half‚Äù of a posture. To transition from an active state of ‚Äúdoing‚Äù a posture, to a relaxed state of ‚Äúbeing‚Äù. And to feel the effects of a posture. Learn to consciously encounter your "edge" of body and mind to release deep tensions and restore the natural flow of the vital life force energy (prana). Good for all levels, from those with some experience to more experienced practitioners. Some experience with yoga and postures is recommended. BIOGRAPHY I have been guiding spiritual seekers for over 30 years with the self-transformative teachings of yoga, meditation, Ayurveda and breathing. Description: All Aboard Club runs inclusive train play sessions for autistic, ADHD and special needs children. The children can build and play with our huge train sets in a safe, understanding and supportive environment.  At our play sessions, the children are in charge. They can run the trains, build the track, and sort out any problems. It builds their confidence, reduces their anxiety, and allows them to play for hours, while developing their social and communication skills.  We'll be running these sessions in the Community Space, inside the Tesco Extra superstore in Addlestone. The Community Space is on the 1st floor, at the back of the clothing section - look out for our All Aboard Club signs. Please note that children will need to be supervised by a parent or carer throughout the session - so no sneaking off to do your shopping!  All Aboard Club staff and volunteers have lived experience of autism and ADHD, so we understand the children's challenges. We do everything possible to make the sessions as accessible and inclusive as possible for each and every child. Our sessions are suitable for children and siblings aged 4 and upwards. A parent or adult carer needs to stay for the whole session. If you‚Äôd like a chat about our play sessions and your child‚Äôs specific needs, please call us on 07948 407343 or email info@allaboardclub.com Getting there: What does an All Aboard Club play session look like? Watch this video:
Title: [Weybridge] Inclusive play sessions for autistic, ADHD and SEN children
Subtitle: Do you know a special needs child who loves trains?

Description: Awaken your mind and body to a new level and learn how to practice meditation in motion. The purpose of this yoga lineage is to guide you toward cultivating a conscious connection, integration and awakening of the body, mind, heart and spirit. You will learn and practice Patanjali's 8 limbs of yoga: Work primarily with the Amrit posture sequence, gentle vinyasa flows and extended posture holding times. Explore the deepest levels of body, mind and spirit with the integrative practices of clear intention, breath, meditative awareness and conscious integration. Learn to balance your nervous system with the ‚Äúfirst half‚Äù and ‚Äúsecond half‚Äù of a posture. To transition from an active state of ‚Äúdoing‚Äù a posture, to a relaxed state of ‚Äúbeing‚Äù. And to feel the effects of a posture. Learn to consciously encounter your "edge" of body and mind to release deep tensions and restore the natural flow of the vital life force energy (prana). Good for all levels, from those with some experience to more experienced practitioners. Some experience with yoga and postures is recommended. BIOGRAPHY I have been guiding spiritual seekers for over 30 years with the self-transformative teachings of yoga, meditation, Ayurveda and breathing. It is my pleasure and honor to guide you toward self-empowerment, transformation and awakened consciousness. I will help you connect to your deepest self and inner guide, from the physical to the soul dimension. SOULDIMENSION.ORG Copyright ¬© 2022 ‚Ä¢ Soul Dimension

Subtitle: Weekly online class with a spiritual focus to awaken one‚Äôs consciousness and highest potential.

Description: Discover the secrets of the world‚Äôs first Garden City with an exciting walking quest through the tree-lined streets. Follow clues and solve puzzles to uncover the founding stories that created a revolutionary new way of living and working, along with an unsolved mystery that still confounds the city. On a train route half-way between London and Cambridge, this beautiful city holds a fascinating quest that will open your eyes to a different piece of UK history. How fast can your detective skills solve the clues and quirks of this pioneering garden city? The route you‚Äôre going to follow in the city is sprinkled with unique places, fun clues and challenges, and incredible stories. The experience will play out like you‚Äôre the main characters of a movie, only that you‚Äôre experiencing everything in first person! Fun dialogue, intrigue, and unexpected interactions are guaranteed. HOW IT WORKS‚ùì 1. Book your tickets üé´ 2. Download the Questo app - it's free üì≤ 3. Head to the starting pointüìç WHAT YOU‚ÄôLL DO The game is an interactive activity where you are guided by a mobile app through the city. With it, you follow directions and solve very fun puzzles, riddles, and cryptic codes. During the game, you will also visit popular and hidden places in the city while learning fun (and we mean it) stories about them. This is a storytelling experience just as much. The people doing these city exploration games gave them an average rating of 4.7/5 around the world. Join the playground too! ------------------ More about Questo üö∂‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Questo is an urban entertainment platform offering thematic real-world exploration games. It is currently available in over 150 cities üåé and has entertained hundreds of thousands of players already. As of today, the app offers more than 400 different experiences created by a growing network of local content creators and event organizers.
Title: Letchworth Garden City: Outdoor Escape Game
Subtitle: Follow clues, solve puzzles, discover new places and learn incredible stories during this city adventure.

Description: Let‚Äôs celebrate International Women‚Äôs Day by coming together in sisterhood.Together we grow. Together we change. Together we rise.Mirror, mirror on the wall‚Ä¶ who is the fairest of them all?Duh, YOU are!Except do you actually see yourself that way?In fact, when you walk past a mirror, what do YOU see?Do you see the inner beauty, strength, and magic what dwells within?Do you see your true self?Or do you see something else‚Ä¶?You are invited to an afternoon devoted to rediscovering your inner beauty and strength.We will sit in sacred circle of togetherness and explore the dormant parts of ourselves by deep diving into practices intended to serve as a mirror reminding us of our true self‚Äîthe wildly magical self that each and every one of us is.WHAT TO EXPECT?-Ceremonial cacao: we will drink the heart opening medicine to help us go deeper within ourselves-Mirror gazing guided meditation: face yourself and learn to love all of yourself unconditionally-Eye gazing guided meditation: meet yourself through the eyes of a stranger-Self exploration through journaling: a self-care exercise-Medicine songs: we will use our voices to soothe our heart and soul-Sharing circle: we will close the afternoon by exchange stories, feelings, and experiencesWHO IS THIS FOR?- Open-minded women looking to expand their perspective- Women seeking to lead with an open heart and nourish their minds- Women who crave deeper connection with other women- Women who value nurturing their mind, body and soulThis workshop calls for openness and vulnerability as we will be participating in open sharing, group work and pair work practicesIMPORTANT INFORMATIONDate: Saturday March 9thTime: 2:00pmPrice: ¬£25 per personLocation: Deep In Yoga, Southend on SeaDress Code: Wear something you feel good in to honour your divine feminineFor more info feel free to send me  Estera (your host) an email to info.healing.whisperer@gmail.comPlease note tickets are non-refundable as there are limited spaces. You can however give your ticket to someone else.You can find me on IG and FB as @healingwhispererHope to see you there!Love to all,EsteraHealing Whisperer

Description: Janice Hallett talks to crime writer Guy Morpuss about her journey from journalist and magazine editor to screenwriter and author. She will describe her research and writing process for her chart-topping debut thriller The Appeal and her second novel The Twyford Code which revolves around a secret code spotted in a famous children‚Äôs author‚Äôs work by an English teacher who subsequently disappears, and the former pupil who starts to investigate her fate decades later.

Description: This is a one-of-a-kind event on a scale we‚Äôve never run before! You‚Äôll be guided through discussions on the big issue of child poverty with Compassion staff, fellow sponsors, volunteers and our Compassion graduates who have been through the programme first hand. We‚Äôre bringing together sponsors, volunteers and staff. You‚Äôll be among friends who want to do more to address the injustice of poverty. What‚Äôs more, you‚Äôll have a unique opportunity to explore and learn from others how we in the UK church can address child poverty. Join us to get excited about how God‚Äôs global Church is bringing hope through presentations, round table discussions, worship and help from Compassion graduates. One graduate who will be joining us is Compassion UK Trustee Richmond Wandera who will share his powerful testimony as well as the incredible work he does to raise and train community-minded church leaders across Africa. A light lunch will also be included at St Peter's Church and doors will open at 9am. Following this event at St Peter's Church (finishing at 2pm) our volunteers will have the unique opportunity to meet and hear more from Compassion graduate Richmond Wandera at Compassion House, Fleet. Richmond will give you a masterclass on how to hone the power of your own sponsorship story. This will start at 3:30pm and after praying, eating and hearing from Richmond we will have time to share food and fellowship together before finishing up at 6pm. The funds raised from the ticket sales will be used towards Compassion UK‚Äôs general charitable purposes.
Title: Round The Table with Compassion + Volunteer meet up at Compassion House
Subtitle: Uniting and equipping God's people to tackle child poverty

Description: All levels of ability welcome - from novice to pro. The class is set up to be fairly loose / generic - so that people can work in whatever direction they choose - be it analytical - or something more expressive - in friendly and relaxed environment - with tutor Matt Burden (MA Visual Communication, Royal College of Art) on hand to offer advice and guidance to people that best suits where they're at, and what they're trying to achieve.  Ages 18 and upward.  WHAT IS LIFE DRAWING Life drawing - drawings made from the living naked human form - can be an important way for anyone with an artistic impulse to exercise and develop their skills ‚Äì I've always likened it to the artistic equivalent of going to the gym. It's also really fun. THE CLASS We'll start with some quicker poses to get everyone warmed up, before moving to some longer poses so you have some time to explore in more depth, with a few breaks in between to share and assess our efforts.  WHAT YOU NEED TO BRING All you really need to get going is some paper and a pencil or two - it really can be as simple as that - and there's much to be said for the simplicity of that.  However, the world is your oyster - so you may want to consider charcoal, crayons, pastels - or something weird and wonderful if you're up for some experimentation - whatever takes your fancy. If you are thinking of getting really extravagant - ie something that might make a mess - please do remember to bring a dust sheet, as we need to take care of the hall.  You may also want something to lean on - boards are great - or easels if that's your thing - though a sturdy sketch book will do just fine in a pinch! There will be a lunch break - so do remember to bring a bite to eat if you think you'll need it. Teas & Coffees will be provided! If you'd like any more info please email Matt at matthew.burden@network.rca.ac.uk ! https://www.facebook.com/HolwellLifeDrawing/
Title: Holwell Life Drawing // Long Saturday Session
Subtitle: Monthly 5 hour life drawing session at Holwell Village Hall!

Description: Awaken your mind and body to a new level and learn how to practice meditation in motion. The purpose of this yoga lineage is to guide you toward cultivating a conscious connection, integration and awakening of the body, mind, heart and spirit. You will learn and practice Patanjali's 8 limbs of yoga: Work primarily with the Amrit posture sequence, gentle vinyasa flows and extended posture holding times. Explore the deepest levels of body, mind and spirit with the integrative practices of clear intention, breath, meditative awareness and conscious integration. Learn to balance your nervous system with the ‚Äúfirst half‚Äù and ‚Äúsecond half‚Äù of a posture. To transition from an active state of ‚Äúdoing‚Äù a posture, to a relaxed state of ‚Äúbeing‚Äù. And to feel the effects of a posture. Learn to consciously encounter your "edge" of body and mind to release deep tensions and restore the natural flow of the vital life force energy (prana). Good for all levels, from those with some experience to more experienced practitioners. Some experience with yoga and postures is recommended. BIOGRAPHY I have been guiding spiritual seekers for over 30 years with the self-transformative teachings of yoga, meditation, Ayurveda and breathing. It is my pleasure and honor to guide you toward self-empowerment, transformation and awakened consciousness. I will help you connect to your deepest self and inner guide, from the physical to the soul dimension. SOULDIMENSION.ORG Copyright ¬© 2022 ‚Ä¢ Soul Dimension
